The Pratt & Whitney R-2800 Double Wasp, an American 18-cylinder, twin-row, air-cooled radial aircraft engine, boasts a displacement of 2,800 cu in (46 L) and belongs to the enduring Wasp family of engines. Throughout and post World War II, the R-2800 was extensively utilized in several crucial American aircraft. Throughout the conflict, Pratt & Whitney persistently innovated to enhance the engine, incorporating features like water injection for takeoff in cargo and passenger aircraft and providing emergency power during combat. They powered thew P-47 https://planehistoria.com/republic-p-47-thunderbolt/ and https://planehistoria.com/grumman-f6f-hellcat/ just to name two.

The school year has just begun, and classrooms across the country fill up with students eager to learn. But for many families impacted by conflict, getting an education continues to be a challenge. Important civil and identity documents - such as birth certificates and national IDs - were often lost, destroyed or confiscated during displacement and many families find it logistically or financially difficult to replace them. Other families were never able to issue these documents in the first place. Because children need identity documents to enroll in school, education is further stalled. USAID and @IOMIraq are providing legal services to survivors of war that helps them access civil and identity documentation as well as compensation for the harm done. By doing so, we're helping children impacted by conflict overcome barriers to learning and access their right to return to the classroom. According to reporting by OCHA, approximately 450,000 of the IDPs and returnees missing documentation in 2021 were children. Over one million Iraqis are missing at least one core civil document, more than 500,000 lacking at least two basic civil papers, and an additional 250,000 lacking at least three or more core legal documents. #USAID #USAID_Iraq #Iraq USAID Middle East IOM Iraq

In 1249 the Great Khan of the Mongols, G√ºy√ºk, decided to assert his authority in the Seljuk sultanate of Rum. He gave his choice as sultan, Kilij Arslan, two thousand Mongol horsemen, and the daughter of a Mongol general in marriage. Kilij was then sent off to destroy his elder brother, Kaykaus, who had the support of the Roman emperor, Vatatzes. This was, among other things, a war between Vatatzes and the Mongols. The Roman emperor wanted to avoid two outcomes: direct conflict with the Mongols, and being forced to become their vassal. His policy was vindicated at Aksaray (Aksaray province, Turkey) where, on 14 June 1249, Kaykaus defeated Kilij Arslan in battle. Afterwards, the Mongols agreed to divide Rum between the brothers, which reduced the threat to Nicaea. Then, after the death of G√ºy√ºk, the Mongol state collapsed into internal warfare. Thus, Vatatzes had staved off the Mongol threat. It re-emerged in 1251, when Hulagu Khan ‚Äì a grandson of Genghis ‚Äì sent an embassy to Nicaea. These embassies were usually the prelude to invasion. Vatatzes was too good a chess player to fall into such a trap: he bribed the Mongol ambassador, who agreed to become the emperor's agent. The 'terror from the East' was no match for the emperor's diplomacy. (Attached is a pic of Hulagu Khan and his queen, Doquz Quatun, depicted as the new Constantine and Helen in a Syriac bible)

Right near the LoC in Dras, Ladakh lies the gorgeous Mushkoh Valley which was a battlefield during the Kargil War against Pakistan . Now the peaceful valley is home to critically endangered Himalayan Brown Bears (amongst a few other places in Ladakh) that are in conflict with us humans as they reach the villages at night and eat their livestock . The situation is quite critical there and the villagers are tired of the havoc created by these bears every day . So, in 1248 the Empire of Nicaea and the Golden Horde were rivals for control of the Seljuk sultanate. The Roman emperor, John Vatatzes, had arranged a marriage alliance with the sultan, Kaykaus II. For their part, the Mongols chose to support Khusyraw's rival and younger brother, Kilij Arslan IV. Both the sultans were young: Kaykaus was just fourteen, his brother twelve. Although they ruled in name, actual government was handled by their chief advisers or 'wazirs'. These were powerful and influential men: Kaykaus's wazir, Shams al-Din al-Isfahani, took as his wife the sultan's Greek mother, a mysterious lady known as 'the secluded woman of Burdul'. A later tradition made her the 'sister' of the Roman emperor, Michael VIII. Despite being half-Greek, Kilij Arslan presented himself as a true Turk: his coinage depicts an archer on a prancing horse, recalling earlier Eastern Anatolian Turkish custom and Mongol styles. This was probably because Kilij Arslan relied on the support of the Mongols and the frontier Turks. The tension was acute. In early 1249, Shams al-Din suddenly fell from power and was tortured and executed. His replacement as wazir, Jalal al-Din, was a pious Muslim and a Greek by blood. The violent coup triggered conflict within the divided sultanate: within a few weeks, the factions were at war. (Attached is an image of a rare coin of Kilij Arslan)

TIPOLOGII UMANE Cei nascuti in zilele de 1, 6, 11, 16, 21, 26, 31 ‚Äì Tipologia A1 ‚Äì Curgere si apa Dintre toate tipologiile, oamenii A1 sunt cei care au viziunea cea mai calda si mai frumoasa asupra iubirii. Pentru ei insisi, intregul lor destin se rezuma la ‚Äúa iubi‚Äù, iar daca nu reusesc acest lucru se simt nefericiti, neimpliniti, traind cu sentimentul ca nu si-au atins menirea in viata. Se indragostesc de multe ori in viata, cu prea multa usurinta am putea spune, de fiecare data ca si cand ar fi prima si ultima oara, insa dezvolta relatii sentimentale de o natura neobisnuita, adesea furtunoase si intense. Au o natura prietenoasa si adora sa traiasca in mijlocul celorlalti, inconjurati de viata, de tumult, de agitatie si de complicatii. Sunt precum apa: dinamici, plini de viata, agili, se strecoara printre stanci si oameni si in ciuda obstacolelor reusesc cumva sa iasa la suprafata. Chiar daca nu realizeaza, au capacitatea de a-i modela pe ceilalti, contribuind la evolutia lor interioara. Sunt insa si schimbatori si uneori, in ciuda unor calitati remarcabile, prea umili, modesti si sensibili la gesturile si cuvintele celor din jur. Cei nascuti in zilele de 2, 7, 12, 17, 22, 27 ‚Äì Tipologia A2 ‚Äì Foc si visuri Oamenii A2 au visuri inalte, asteptari si cerinte de proportii cosmice de la ei insisi, iar viata lor intreaga se construieste in jurul implinirii ambitiilor si dorintelor lor secrete. S-au nascut sa se redescopere, sa se lase modelati si sa nu isi lase spiritul sa se stinga. Sunt perfectionisti innascuti si atunci cand vine vorba de ceea ce-si doresc rareori fac lucrurile pe jumatate. Oameni A2 sunt ca focul: spontani, minunati, puternici, creativi, dominanti pana la cotropire, crezand intens in propria putere, impunand respect si admiratie, dar totodata si teama. Nu multi sunt cei care le stau neconditionat in preajma fara a nu se simti folositi, manipulati, influentati chiar si la un nivel inconstient. Cu greu incredinteaza unei persoane, fie ea si prieten, increderea lor. Pot fi numiti oricum, numai naivi nu. Isi cunosc interesele si stiu sa puna in balanta atat aspectele pozitive cat si pe cele negative ale unei chestiuni. Iubirea si implinirea sentimentala ocupa un loc important in viata oamenilor A2, insa intotdeauna cautarea persoanei potrivite se aseamana prea mult cu cautarea perfectiunii. Iubirea le survine pe o cale mai anevoioasa si de multe ori constata cu tristete ca au iubit cu adevarat atunci cand relatia respectiva se afla la final. Este foarte posibil ca de-a lungul vietii sa dezvolte tendinta spre egoism, malitiozitate, insensibilitate si sa emita exigente prea mari de la partenerul de viata. Cei nascuti in zilele de 3, 8, 13, 18, 23, 28 ‚Äì Tipologia C3 ‚Äì Aer si libertate Oamenii C3 sunt nascuti sa fie liberi, sa-si exprime sentimentele, sa spuna deschis ceea ce gandesc, sa circule dupa bunul plac, sa calatoreasca, sa cunoasca, sa experimenteze dupa legile propriului arbitru, sa transmita mai departe cunostintele pe care le detin. De multe ori, idealurile lor de viata nu cunosc o reprezentare concreta si materiala, ci sunt simbolizate de alte persoane. Oamenii C3 sunt totodata extrem de pasionali si impulsivi si pot deveni dependenti de cei pe care ii iubesc, avand tendinta de a-i sufoca, de a-i absorbi spiritual. Chiar daca detin arta stapanirii si a controlarii emotiilor, uneori deciziile pe care le iau ii sperie pe cei din jur prin necunoscutul si controversele carora le dau nastere. Daca vrei sa te iubeasca, lasa-i liberi si nu le ingradi spiritul. Sunt facuti sa simta, sa vada, sa guste, sa se delecteze cu tot ce este mai frumos pe lumea aceasta, sa experimenteze senzatii si emotii supreme. Cu greu poti fi legati de un loc, insa daca isi gasesc aici rostul, dupa lungi peregrinari, se intorc de buna voie la ceea ce au lasat in urma. Cei nascuti in zilele de 4, 9, 14, 19, 24, 29 ‚Äì Tipologia D4 ‚Äì Pamant si stabilitate Oamenii D4 sunt precum pamantul -consistenti, vitali, esentiali pentru existenta celorlalti, stabili, exercitand un magnetism aparte, toleranti pana la extreme, cu o minte ascutita si patrunzatoare. Sunt oameni practici, calmi, pacifisti, echilibrati, cu un simt al judecatii si al ratiunii foarte bine dezvoltat, stapanindu-si emotiile si exteriorizandu-le doar in fata acelor persoane pe care le considera a avea o afinitate cu ei. Cred in prietenie, in stabilitatea ei si o plaseaza adesea asupra tuturor celorlalte relatii interumane. Sunt insa adesea greoi, prea cerebrali, lipsiti de spontaneitate, luand deciziile cu mintea si mai putin cu sufletul. Felul lor de a iubi este unul loial, stabilind relatii de lunga durata cu o persoana care le aduce liniste si armonie. Chiar daca vor iubi intens si se vor simti atrasi de o persoana cu o personalitate opusa lor, vor avea tendinta de a se retrage la primul semn de conflict sau neintelegere. Foarte probabil ca se vor sustrage dintr-o relatie prea pasionala sub pretextul ca nu este ceea ce isi doresc de la viata. (truncated)

One of the biggest struggles when you‚Äôre being narcissistically abused‚Ä¶ Is that you don‚Äôt KNOW you‚Äôre being narcissistically abused. And the confusion is actually part of the abuse. But because you don‚Äôt yet realize what‚Äôs happening, you think it‚Äôs a: Communication issue. Difference of opinion. Personality conflict. You‚Äôre looking for a rational explanation to an irrational situation. You‚Äôre looking for the cause or source, thinking that if you can figure out ‚Äúwhy‚Äù it‚Äôs happening then you can figure out ‚Äúwhat‚Äù it is and ‚Äúhow‚Äù to solve it. And the search for ‚Äúwhy‚Äù can keep you cycling for a VERY long time. Because there‚Äôs no small amount of information about relationships these days. You can easily go down a rabbit hole about: Love languages. Attachment styles. Communication strategies. Astrological signs. All in a desperate attempt to ‚Äúfigure it out.‚Äù But here‚Äôs the thing‚Ä¶ Toxic is toxic no matter what attachment style you have. Abuse is abuse no matter what your love language is. Don‚Äôt get so distracted with all the relationship advice that you normalize toxic behaviors. If you‚Äôve been stuck ruminating, trying to figure out what‚Äôs causing your relationship struggles‚Ä¶ Stop searching. And start observing. What patterns do you see? How do you feel around this person? Are they being kind and respectful? Do they acknowledge your reality? Do you have to justify how you feel? Can you agree to disagree? You have to step OUT of the chaos to make sense of it. And if you‚Äôd like some help making sense of what you observe, my new book was written with you in mind! Take these 2-minute quizzes to get clarity! > bit.ly/narcquizzes:=:https://www.chelseybrookecole.com/quizzes/ Looking to heal from narcissistic abuse? Join 35k+ survivors and get my bi-monthly newsletter on healing from narc abuse here > bit.ly/narcabusenewsletter:=:https://www.chelseybrookecole.com/newsletter/ #narcissism #narcissisticabuse #narcissist #ifonlyidknown #ifonlyidknownbook #healing

If you want a fake relationship, avoid conflict. If you want a real relationship, learn to fight wise. By which I just mean learn how to honor BOTH your own experience AND your partner‚Äôs ... at the same time. Learn to fully feel what you are feeling while simultaneously holding space for your beloved other to fully feel what they are feeling, too. Make space for how they are seeing/describing things even as you continue to hold space for your own ‚Äúversion of truth.‚Äù I know that ain‚Äôt easy ... which is why we run from conflict (even when we stay and fight). We far too often expect to be seen and heard before we are willing to see and hear. Yet we cannot receive a love we are not willing to offer. The partner you‚Äôre looking for is not the one you‚Äôll never fight with. It‚Äôs the one who‚Äôs willing to stay in the fire with you when things suddenly turn shitty, who‚Äôs willing to take radical ownership of their part in starting that shit-fire, and who can (at least before long) say, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry for my part in this. I love you. Let‚Äôs figure this out together.‚Äù Wouldn‚Äôt just that much be amazing? Author: Bryan Reeves

text: HAPPY FEAST OF OUR LADY OF THE MOST HOLY ROSARYüôèüéâüéäüôè BACKGROUND This feast was established by Pope Pius V to commemorate the great victory of the Christian army against the Turks in the Battle of Lepanto in 1571. All soldiers on the battlefield prayed the Rosary for three hours and the wind has shifted in their favor. They were able to defeat an army three times bigger, in one of the greatest naval victory in history. Pope Pius V named this the Feast of Our Lady of Victories, to be celebrated on October 7th. In 1573, Pope Gregory XIII changed the title of this memorial to Feast of the Holy Rosary. Pope Paul VI established the form that we celebrate this feast today, in 1969 under the name ‚ÄúOur Lady of the Rosary‚Äù. ‚ÄúThe celebration of this day invites all to mediate upon the mysteries of Christ, following the example of the Blessed Virgin Mary who was so singularly associated with the incarnation, passion and glorious resurrection of the Son of God.‚Äù Fragment from the Christian Prayer (Liturgy of the Hours) Padre Pio of Pietrelcina, praying for the conversion of sinners often said, ‚ÄúLove the Madonna and pray the rosary, for her rosary is the weapon against the evils of the world today.‚Äù PRAYER Queen of the Most Holy Rosary, in these times of such brazen impiety, show your power with the signs of your former victories. Look with mercy on the Church of your Son, on His Vicar on earth, and on all the clergy and laity, who are sorely oppressed in this mighty conflict. Powerful vanquisher of all heresies, hasten the hour of mercy even though the hour of God‚Äôs justice is every day provoked by the countless sins of men. As I kneel before you in prayer, obtain for me my requests (Mention your request here‚Ä¶) Queen of the Most Holy Rosary, pray for us.

text: Therefore, since we have been justified through faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ, through whom we have gained access by faith into this grace in which we now stand. And we rejoice in the hope of the glory of God. ‚Äî Romans 5:1-2 Thoughts on Today's Verse... Peace is more than the mercurial, vaporous, whimsical wish of folks who want everyone to get along and things to be calm. The peace the apostle Paul describes is true peace with God. This peace goes much deeper than simply our desire for calmness and a lack of conflict. Jesus, through his sacrificial obedience to God, has made peace with God real for us. Yes, God provided it by grace. Yes, God is the one who ensures it because of that grace. But, because this peace is tied to him and his character, we can rejoice and anticipate being caught up in the glory of our majestic and holy God in whom we have eternal peace. My Prayer... O majestic and holy God on high, I praise you for the gift of your grace in Jesus. Please give me confidence and trust to stand in your grace and be emboldened to live for you with a life full of holiness, anticipation, and joy. In Jesus' name, I pray. Amen.

*FRIDAY, 6 OCTOBER 2023* *TEXT: PROVERBS 10: 1 - 17* *TOPIC: THE CLUSTER OF WISDOM* *PROVERBS 10: 1 - 17 NIV* 1:The proverbs of Solomon: A wise son brings joy to his father, but a foolish son brings grief to his mother. 2:Ill-gotten treasures have no lasting value, but righteousness delivers from death. 3:The Lord does not let the righteous go hungry, but he thwarts the craving of the wicked. 4:Lazy hands make for poverty, but diligent hands bring wealth. 5:He who gathers crops in summer is a prudent son, but he who sleeps during harvest is a disgraceful son. 6:Blessings crown the head of the righteous, but violence overwhelms the mouth of the wicked. 7:The name of the righteous is used in blessings, but the name of the wicked will rot. 8:The wise in heart accept commands, but a chattering fool comes to ruin. 9:Whoever walks in integrity walks securely, but whoever takes crooked paths will be found out. 10:Whoever winks maliciously causes grief, and a chattering fool comes to ruin. 11:The mouth of the righteous is a fountain of life, but the mouth of the wicked conceals violence. 12:Hatred stirs up conflict, but love covers over all wrongs. 13:Wisdom is found on the lips of the discerning, but a rod is for the back of one who has no sense. 14:The wise store up knowledge, but the mouth of a fool invites ruin. 15:The wealth of the rich is their fortified city, but poverty is the ruin of the poor. 16:The wages of the righteous is life, but the earnings of the wicked are sin and death. 17:Whoever heeds discipline shows the way to life, but whoever ignores correction leads others astray. *THE CLUSTER OF WISDOM* Today's text gives us an idea about how to deal with wealth and poverty and points out that wealth acquired by unrighteous means has no value but wealth gotten through righteous means is far more valuable. The wisdom here is that diligence under God's guidance is the secret of acquiring wealth but a lazy person is a disgrace and is heading towards poverty (vs.4-5). In fact, verses 15-17 confirm that riches fortify the city for the righteous but verses 6 and 7 show that the wise man shows the contrast between the life of a righteous person and the wicked. While blessings will be the portion of the righteous, violence overwhelms the mouth of the wicked and even their names will rot (vs.7). Verses 8 and 9 show that the wise accepts and is obedient to instruction whereas the fool pays no attention to instruction and that one can walk with his or her head high if such a person is known for integrity but he who takes the crooked path will be exposed. *QUESTION:* Are you on the path of folly or pursuing righteousness and hard work? *PRAYER:* Lord God, help me to always tread the path of wisdom by pursuing righteousness in order to attract Your blessings, in Jesus name. Amen. *Food for the Day - 2023*

text: ŸÖÿß ŸÖÿπŸÜŸâ conflict

For the one who feels like you are in way over your head. The one who doesn‚Äôt know how to swim and stay afloat in this diagnosis, this marriage, this parenting role, this divorce, this caregiving role, this conflict, this battle, this bank statement, this season. Sometimes (oftentimes, in fact), no matter how hard we try to keep our head (and our heart!) above water, the current is too strong, the swirling and pulling of the circumstance too much, the water of our situation too deep. Try as we might, we are helpless to save ourself. We need a Savior. And praise God in Jesus we have one. Not only a Savior who saves us from our sin, but a Savior who steps into our everyday life, extends His nail-scarred hand and pulls us up. He lifts us from that which we feel will drown us and sets us on a firm foundation ‚Äì Himself. The solid Rock. And from this vantage point, we realize nothing is too strong, too much, or too deep for our God. And we rest in the beautiful truth that we aren‚Äôt called to swim through this in our own power, we are called to navigate through it in HIS. Our Savior will be faithful to carry us through, we simply need to reach out, take hold of His hand, and never let go.~‚ù§ ¬©Ô∏è Stacy L. Sanchez

Forever and a day ; A thousand years ago Moonbeams streaked down through the jungle trees of Vietnam like silver tracer rounds. As we lay there upon the muddy red damp ground in the darkness, they were a welcome sight. Our Eyes searched and rode the moonbeams upward towards the freedom of the heavens. In them we escaped the hellish moments where time stood still. Vietnam at its best was a time of heartache and a time of loneliness and misery. We who fought this war were mostly teenagers still wet behind the ears. The majority of us were fresh out of boot camp that got tangled up in an unwanted and unpopular conflict. There were rare moments in the Nam when we had the time to think about a different place and time. Times when the moonlight shimmered in the perfumed hair of our high school sweethearts and we could for a moment return back to a time when the passion of youth ruled our hearts. There was a time when Vietnam was just a distant land that did not compete for our lives or our thoughts. But now as we lay in wait for our enemy upon a bloodied foreign soil thousands of miles away, home was a bittersweet memory. Nothing more than a surrealistic dream where we once cruised the familiar streets in our parents‚Äô car and listened for that special song on the radio that would become "our song". Oh sure, there was always the inevitable newscast filled with static that told of a distant war being fought in a place called Vietnam. Yet the news seemed so unreal and so far away, that what was going on ‚Äúover there‚Äù didn‚Äôt matter. A simple turn of the radio knob, a mere flick of the wrist would end the grim reapers‚Äô tale and music would fill the air. The innocence of our time was replaced with turbulence of a divided nation. The corruptness of an unwanted war and the unrest of the sixties stole the youth of those of us who believed in and enjoyed our freedom. We who held our own freedom sacred and with honor went off to fight for, and protect that same God given right in a foreign country; just as our fathers did before us. This once distant place became a time of times for many of us and the Vietnam Conflict became the end of time for the warriors who fought and died in an unpopular country that would become infamously known as, Vietnam. Boon

The war in Afghanistan began 22 years ago today. More than 26,000 members of the Australian Defence Force served in Afghanistan over two decades. 45 Australians were killed, and more than 260 were wounded in the conflict. On the 22nd anniversary of the war, we honour the service of those who sacrificed so much to try and bring peace and stability to Afghanistan. Lest we forget. If you need support, please contact Open Arms - Veterans & Families Counselling on 1800 011 046. They provide free and confidential counselling and support for current and former serving ADF members and their families.

The African Christian Democratic Party (ACDP) views the decision by the Anglican Church of Southern Africa to label Israel an ‚ÄòApartheid State‚Äô as shocking, shortsighted, and disappointing. ACDP leader Rev Kenneth Meshoe said, ‚ÄúArchbishop Thabo Mokgoba knows that the Church is given a ministry of reconciliation, and thus, to be a credible facilitator of reconciliation, one has to be objective and not take sides with any of the parties in conflict. The Archbishop expressed his concern for Palestinians but does not express similar concerns for many Israeli victims of terror attacks at the hands of Palestinian terror groups. ‚ÄúThe Archbishop has, in my opinion, discredited and jeopardised his chances of being a credible mediator in the Israeli/ Palestinian conflict by taking sides with one against the other. ‚ÄúExcept for security concerns, there is no place in Israel that Palestinians are not allowed to access as it happened in apartheid South Africa. There are no amenities or buildings, schools or universities that are designated for Jewish use only as it happened in South Africa during apartheid. ‚ÄúLabelling Israel an ‚ÄòApartheid State‚Äô is inaccurate, malicious, and will not help to promote peace and harmony in the Middle East. Its only purpose is to demonise Israel and to isolate her to delegitimise Israel‚Äôs existence. ‚ÄúThe unfortunate decision taken by the Anglican Church of Southern Africa to label Israel an ‚ÄòApartheid State‚Äô betrays the memory of those who suffered through the real apartheid of South Africa. Having visited Israel on several occasions, I know that nothing happening in that country, that I have seen or read, can be compared to apartheid in South Africa. ‚ÄúThose who say what is happening in Israel is like apartheid South Africa are trivialising the suffering that black South Africans suffered. They are taking the sting out of the pain that we suffered under apartheid. If South African apartheid was like what people are seeing in Israel, then there would never have been any need for Nelson Mandela and others to go to prison because they would have had all the rights Arabs in Israel are enjoying today such as the right to vote and the right to choose, and freedom of movement. ‚ÄúThere are judges in Israeli courts who are not Jewish, and yet are allowed by law to preside over cases involving Jewish suspects. In apartheid South Africa, that was not allowed. You have Arab teachers in Israel who are teaching Jewish children. In apartheid South Africa, black teachers could never teach white children. This was real apartheid in South Africa where even separate amenities were enforced. ‚ÄúThe charge that Israel is an ‚ÄòApartheid State‚Äô is a lie about the real Israel, and it is a lie about the real apartheid that South Africa observed and practised.‚Äù ‚ÄúThe regrettable decision by the Anglican Church of Southern Africa to label Israel an ‚ÄòApartheid State‚Äô will never be supported by the ACDP as it is based on a lie, political correctness, and hatred for the only democratic Jewish State in the Middle East,‚Äù Meshoe said.

@everyone *COMMENTS REGARDING CHARACTERS AND CAST MEMBERS* Some comments recently on a few posts have been bordering on hate which is something we dont want to see in the group. Saying you dislike a character is ok, but some of the comments lately have been awful. ü´£ We all have varied opinions on different characters which is great and makes great discussion, but unfortunately a few people have taken this to a level of hate. As the admin of this group, i would like to ask that any further comments that have dislike towards a character be kept sensible and polite please. None of the new characters have been on screen long enough to be able to be judged fully. The rodwells are a prime example of that. There were hardly on screen before the rested period, and have only started becoming more involved recently. Please remember what you see on screen are characters, and the cast members behind them are acting how they are told to act to bring that character to life. In the case of new characters, they have had such little onscreen time so far, you can not judge the cast member on their abilitys until you have got to know the character they are playing. Every cast member currently in neighbours are very talented or Jason Herbison would not of picked them for the role. Remember 1 thing when judging - Your comments can make or break a cast members career. An actor is picked to match the character not the other way round so if you find a character annoying it's because that character has been written to be annoying on purpose. Also shows especially soaps need the characters to resemble real people for them to be successful, This means just like real life you need to represent people with all different personalities, to create a community that feels like real life and not fiction. For those who went to the meet and greets on the celebration tour, and had the honour of meeting some of their favourite cast members, that was perfect example of how different the actor is compared to their characters and how we know them on screen. *Please remember this when judging a character and cast member* *Word's such, as bimbo, nonce, dipstick, retarded are forms of hate speech, so please refrain from using them* If you are not a fan of Neighbours then don't join the group, as you're purpose is only to cause conflict between group members. ü´£ Healthy discussions are important, but please respect everyone's opinions and views. text: I do my best to be sensitive in the language I use, not wanting to drive people away from a life-giving message because of controversial terminology. Yet there are times when being blunt is essential, and now is one of those times. That is why Pastor Andy Stanley must be called out publicly for inviting practicing homosexuals to speak at his Unconditional Conference. The fact that these men claim to be committed Christians makes the sin all the more grievous. I‚Äôm speaking specifically of Justin Lee and Brian Nietzel, both of whom are not only openly ‚Äúgay Christians‚Äù but are also ‚Äúmarried‚Äù to their same-sex partners. This means that, according to the plain teaching of Scripture, they will not inherit the kingdom of God (see 1 Corinthians 6:9-10) and their actions are detestable in His sight (Leviticus 18:22). Justin and Brian might be very gracious and kind men. Their partners might be terrific people in many ways. They might even model certain aspects of Christian compassion and grace and profess some orthodox beliefs. But that only magnifies the level of deception involved, since Satan himself comes as an angel of light (see 2 Corinthians 11:13-15). It is true that, on the Sunday following the Unconditional Conference Pastor Stanley reaffirmed that biblical marriage is the union of a man and a woman and claimed that his church did not condone sin, although he made other statements that muddied the water and caused confusion. But he also stated that both Justin and Brian have spoken to his people before, with his blessing and approval. This means that on several occasions, he has willfully exposed his flock to their message and example, thereby undermining the positive statements he made in his sermon. This is as destructive as it is confusing. Pastor Stanley, with whom I‚Äôve been in friendly correspondence and interaction since 2015, pressing him for clarity on these issues, emphasized that the purpose of the conference was not to debate theology. Rather, it was to help parents understand how they should deal with their kids who identify as LGBTQ+. He didn‚Äôt want this generation of Christians to perpetuate the errors of past generations, where parents often rejected their kids or tried to strong-arm them into becoming straight. It was time, he said, for this to stop. The church must do better. On this we agree, point for point. We need to do better. We need to show unconditional love. We need to recognize how deep these struggles can be. And we need to understand the degree to which Christian young people, in particular, can suffer an acute conflict over these feelings, which they did not ask for. Yes, let us be educated and let us love well. But under no circumstances should we affirm a child‚Äôs gay or bi or trans or queer identity. Even more emphatically, under no circumstances should we tell them that they can follow Jesus and be in a same-sex, sexual or romantic relationship. God forbid. To do so is to be complicit in their demise. In a statement to The Roys Report, Justin Lee claimed that he didn‚Äôt ‚Äútake any position on topics like same-sex marriage or sexual behavior‚Äù at the conference. Instead, he stated, ‚ÄúMy primary message was that Christians should look to Jesus and to Scripture‚Äînot to me or any human source‚Äîfor determining what is God‚Äôs will. And that Christians who follow Jesus‚Äôs example can treat others with love and empathy without compromising on truth.‚Äù But what about his personal example? What about the example of Brian? What about their online resources and teachings? To paraphrase, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not taking a public position here on same-sex marriage or sexual behavior. But in my personal example, in which I am in a same-sex marriage and have sex with my male partner, I‚Äôm shouting quite loudly to all of you.‚Äù The very presence of Justin and Brian at the conference, along with men like Christian ethicist David Gushee, who believes that God affirms committed, same-sex relationships, sent a clear message to all those in attendance. ‚ÄúYes,‚Äù they were saying, ‚Äúyour kids can practice homosexuality and follow Jesus at the same time.‚Äù And these men were not just given a platform but were honored and celebrated for who they are. Otherwise, they would not have been invited to speak. Consider that it was Justin who founded the ‚ÄúGay Christian Network,‚Äù with most of the adherents in the network affirming same-sex, ‚ÄúChristian‚Äù relationships. And Justin‚Äôs new organization, called Nuance Ministries, recommends groups like the Reformation Project, which actively seeks to change church views on the Bible and homosexual practice. (See https://gaychristian.net/,:=:https://gaychristian.net/ one of the Nuance Ministries links; while still under construction, the site links to the Reformation Project and others of like mind.) As for Brian, his bio states that he ‚Äúis a gay man committed to his faith and love for Jesus. He grew up in the Evangelical Church and struggled with his sexuality, then later in life found his peace with God. He is (truncated)

Elder's Meditation of the Day October 6

"Lots of people hardly ever feel real soil under their feet, see plants grow except in flower pots, or get far enough beyond the street light to catch the enchantment of a night sky studded with stars. When people live far from scenes of the Great Spirit's making, it's easy for them to forget His laws." 
--Tatanga Mani (Walking Buffalo), STONEY

Nature is life's greatest teacher. The natural laws are hidden in nature. Hidden are solutions to everyday problems such as; conflict resolution, how to forgive, lessons about differences, how to manage organizations, how to think. Hidden are feelings. You can look at something and you will feel it. At night, have you ever looked at the sky when there are no clouds? As you look at all the stars, your heart will become very joyful. You will walk away feeling joyful and peaceful. We need to visit nature so we can see and feel these things.

My Creator, let me learn nature's lessons.

Copied with the permission of Don L. Coyhis, from the book Meditations with Native American Elders:  The Four Seasons

Hard work pays off! We're excited to share the two most recent Maine Game Warden promotions: Please join us in Congratulating Lieutenant Michael Joy and Corporal Cody Lounder! Sergeant Mike Joy has been selected as the new Lieutenant for the northern Maine division based out of Ashland. He has dedicated the last 30 years of his career to the Maine Warden Service, has been assigned to districts in each division of the state throughout his tenure, and was promoted to Sergeant in 2018. Sergeant Joy spent more than 23 years on the dive team, serving nine of those years as team leader and Corporal. Sergeant Joy also developed our airboat training program and is a member of the Critical Incident Stress Management Team. He is sure to hit the ground running in his new role during the busy fall season. Warden Cody Lounder has been selected as the Special Projects Corporal assigned to the Augusta Headquarters, and will be assisting with, among other assignments, oversight of the Wildlife Conflict Agent program, the bureau‚Äôs training program, the guide examination process, legislative process as well as the bureau‚Äôs accreditation process. He has been with the Maine Warden Service for more than nine years and is a member of the Honor Guard. He has been a Warden Training Officer for more than three years, is an Emergency Vehicle Operation Course instructor, is a breath testing device instructor, and spends the spring and early summer training southern Maine boating deputies. Warden Lounder is also a certified Crime Scene Investigator and has been a member of the Evidence Response Team for over seven years. Congratulations Lieutenant Joy and Corporal Lounder! The Maine Warden Service is extremely lucky and very proud to have you on our team. #GameWarden #AllInForTheMaineOutdoors #WardenService #Promotion

text: We acknowledge the significance of Devolved units in ensuring that services gets to the people down at the grassroot level and as such we commend the continued effort put by County Governments across the regions to facilitate access to justice through various initiatives that targets conflict resolutions by use of alternative means. We embrace the pledge by the County Government of Bomet and the leadership of all the Sub Counties within Bomet to aid in facilitating smooth access to Justice through donation of land where Small Claims Courts will be established to help reduce the backlog of cases in Courts and also the County Government's pledge to aid in providing legal services on Land disputes to the residents in a bid to end a surge in Land Succession Cases. With other Judicial Service Commissioners during a courtesy visit to H.E Prof. Hillary Barchok; The Governor of Bomet at the County Offices - Bomet.

NATIVE AMERICANS ‚Äì THE FIRST OWNERS OF AMERICA Native Americans, or the indigenous peoples of the Americas, are the pre-Columbian inhabitants of North and South America and their descendants. Those who live within the boundaries of the present-day United States are composed of numerous, distinct tribes, bands and ethnic groups, many of which survive as intact, sovereign nations. Most authorities agree that the first evidence of people inhabiting North America indicates that they migrated here from Eurasia over 13,000 years ago, most likely crossing along the Bering Land Bridge, which was in existence during the Ice Age. However, some historians believe that people had migrated into the Americas much earlier, up to 40,000 years ago. These early Paleo-Indians spread throughout the Americas, diversifying into many hundreds of culturally distinct nations and tribes. Application of the term ‚ÄúIndian‚Äù originated with Christopher Columbus, who, in his search for Asia, thought that he had arrived in the East Indies. However, there is considerable evidence in support of successful explorations which led to Norse settlement of Greenland, the L‚ÄôAnse aux Meadows settlement in Newfoundland, and potentially others some 500 years prior to Columbus landing in the Bahamas. From the Native American aspect, many tribes‚Äô oral histories indicate they have been living here since their genesis, as described by a wide range of creation myths. By the time European adventurers arrived in the 15th century, scholars estimate that more than 50 million people were already living in the Americas. Of these, some 10 million lived in the region that would later become the United States. As time passed, these migrants and their descendants pushed south and east, adapting as they went. With these new arrivals came centuries of conflict and adjustment between Old and New World societies. Today, Native Americans account for about 1.5 percent of the United States population, many of whom continue to take pride in their ancestral traditions ‚Äî still practicing the music, art, and ceremonies that took place many years ago.

Negotiations are a complex and dynamic process of communication and compromise between two or more parties to reach an agreement or resolve a dispute. Free Negotiation Courses üî•üî• 1. Negotiation Skills and Effective Communication https://lnkd.in/dzaGaCek 2. Successful Negotiation: Essential Strategies and Skills https://lnkd.in/dARiV4Qq 3. Negotiation skills: Negotiate and resolve conflict https://lnkd.in/dh95SwMM 4. Leadership and Negotiation Skills Specialization https://lnkd.in/epZmpfSx Here are some key aspects of negotiations: üëâPreparation: Before entering negotiations, it's crucial to research the subject matter, understand your goals and priorities, and anticipate the other party's interests and potential objections. This preparation helps you come to the table well-informed and confident. üëâOpening: Start the negotiation with a polite and constructive tone. Express your interest in finding a mutually beneficial solution and set the stage for productive discussions. üëâInformation Exchange: Both parties should share relevant information and perspectives to gain a better understanding of each other's needs and constraints. üëâOffer and Counteroffer: Negotiations often involve a series of offers and counteroffers. Each party presents its proposal, and the other party responds with adjustments or alternatives. üëâCompromise: Negotiation typically requires concessions from both sides. Be prepared to make compromises while staying focused on your primary objectives. üëâBATNA: Understanding your Best Alternative to a Negotiated Agreement (BATNA) is essential. It's the fallback option you have if negotiations fail, and it helps you set your limits and make informed decisions. üëâZOPA: The Zone of Possible Agreement (ZOPA) is the range within which a mutually acceptable deal can be reached. Identifying and expanding the ZOPA is a key negotiation goal. üëâEmotional Intelligence: Effective negotiators are skilled at managing emotions, both their own and those of the other party. Staying calm and composed can lead to better outcomes. üëâActive Listening: Pay close attention to what the other party is saying. Active listening helps you understand their perspective and build rapport. üëâProblem-Solving: Negotiation is not just about haggling over positions but finding creative solutions to shared problems. Brainstorming and thinking outside the box can lead to breakthroughs. üëâClosure: When an agreement is reached, document it in writing and clarify the next steps and responsibilities of each party. üëâPost-Negotiation Evaluation: After the negotiation, take time to assess what worked well and what could be improved for future negotiations. #communication #leadership #management #projectmanagement

Deci, la o primƒÉ vedere, ar fi extrem de u»ôor! Practica »ôi politicul ne omoarƒÉ! Prioritatea absolutƒÉ pentru Rom√¢nia ≈üi pentru Europa √Æn acest moment ar trebui sƒÉ fie ie≈üirea din logica periculoasƒÉ a conflictului ≈üi a √ÆncurajƒÉrii rƒÉzboiului din Ucraina pentru a opri √Æn acest fel at√¢t pierderea de vie»õi omene»ôti, c√¢t ≈üi criza economicƒÉ datoratƒÉ √Æn mare parte participƒÉrii Europei, at√¢t √Æn mod direct, c√¢t »ôi indirect, la acest conflict. At√¢ta vreme c√¢t Uniunea EuropeanƒÉ, c√¢t ≈üi √Æntreaga lume occidentalƒÉ, de aici »ôi de peste ocean, sunt parte din acest conflict pe care √Æl finan≈£eazƒÉ ≈üi √ÆnarmeazƒÉ, lucrurile nu vor reveni la normal, din contrƒÉ se vor amplifica cre√¢nd crize economice, financiare »ôi sociale fƒÉrƒÉ precedent √Æn istoria modernƒÉ »ôi contemporanƒÉ a lumii, √Æntorc√¢ndu-ne √Æn Evul Mediu. ≈ûi nu este vorba doar de sanc≈£iunile pe care UE le-a impus Rusiei ≈üi care lovesc √Æn primul r√¢nd economiile ≈£ƒÉrilor europene, »ôi la nivel macro al UE, ci ≈üi de banii direc≈£i investi≈£i √Æn acest conflict, fie sub formƒÉ de armament, fie sub formƒÉ de sprijin financiar pentru Ucraina, mƒÉsuri care doar prelungesc rƒÉzboiul √ÆndepƒÉrt√¢nd posibilitatea unei solu≈£ionƒÉri pa≈ünice. Cu c√¢t Europa investe≈üte mai mult √Æn acest conflict, cu at√¢t se pierd mai multe vie≈£i ≈üi se distrug mai multe bunuri, iar nivelul de trai al cetƒÉ≈£enilor din UE, fie ei italieni, rom√¢ni sau de altƒÉ na≈£ionalitate, se prƒÉbu≈üe≈üte. √én Italia se vorbe≈üte mult de problemele economice ale Italiei, √Æn Rom√¢nia de ale Rom√¢niei, ≈üi tot a≈üa √Æn fiecare stat UE, dar toate aceste discu≈£ii sunt inutile p√¢nƒÉ c√¢nd nu ne angajƒÉm √Æn √Æncheierea conflictului din Ucraina pentru a reveni, de exemplu, la achizi≈£ia de energie ieftinƒÉ care sƒÉ impulsioneze economiile noastre. Europa s-a autosanc≈£ionat √Æn acest conflict, iar pre≈£ul e plƒÉtit de cetƒÉ≈£eni, fie ei italieni, rom√¢ni sau de altƒÉ na≈£ionalitate. Iar liderii europeni ≈üi liderii ≈£ƒÉrilor noastre insistƒÉ pe aceastƒÉ cale spre prƒÉpastie, de≈üi efectele acestei pozi≈£ii sunt evidente: sƒÉrƒÉcirea popula≈£iei ≈üi distrugerea competitivitƒÉ≈£ii economice europene. ParcƒÉ discutƒÉm de un grup de sinuciga»ôi care, din pƒÉcate, trag dupƒÉ ei, fƒÉrƒÉ voie, na»õiuni √Æntregi. DupƒÉ cum a»õi observat, cea mai prejudiciatƒÉ parte √Æn acest conflict este UE, √Æn timp ce Federa»õia RusƒÉ »ôi-a √ÆntƒÉrit moneda »ôi economia, construie»ôte BRICS »ôi o dezvoltƒÉ √Æntr-un ritm ame»õitor, USA √Æ»ôi extinde hegemonia inclusiv pe teritoriul european, dar √Æ»ôi distruge propria economie, √ÆnsƒÉ √ÆncearcƒÉ sƒÉ compenseze prin produc»õia »ôi exportul de armament »ôi produc»õia de cereale din Ucraina care apar»õine antreprenorilor americani, numai UE nu realizeazƒÉ cƒÉ a fost prinsƒÉ √Æntr-o capcanƒÉ »ôi urmeazƒÉ sƒÉ se dezintegreze √Æntr-un ritm accelerat, pozi»õie observatƒÉ de Austria care √Æ»ôi √ÆntƒÉre»ôte rela»õiile cu Federa»õia RusƒÉ invoc√¢nd contracte semnate anterior √Æn 2018 pentru energie ieftinƒÉ, contracte care parcƒÉ au fost semnate √Æn cuno»ôtin»õƒÉ de cauzƒÉ a conflictului iscat √Æn urmƒÉ cu un an. Numai liderii europeni nu √Æn»õeleg, »ôi din pƒÉcate nici liderii italieni, iar de cei rom√¢ni nici nu mai vorbesc. 2) Rom√¢nia are vedere spre Marea NeagrƒÉ »ôi, de asemenea, √Æmparte o grani»õƒÉ lungƒÉ cu Ucraina, √Æntr-o pozi»õie strategicƒÉ pentru transferul de arme NATO. Ce poate face guvernul de la Bucure»ôti sƒÉ nu fie implicat √Æn conflict? 2. √éncƒÉ din primele zile ale conflictului am propus o solu≈£ie at√¢t pentru Rom√¢nia, c√¢t »ôi pentru toate statele implicate √Æn conflict, anticip√¢nd dezastrul √Æn care ne aflƒÉm acum, sub forma unui Memorandum intitulat ‚ÄùNeutralitate pentru Rom√¢nia ‚Äì Pacea de la Bucure≈üti‚Äù, ale cƒÉrui prevederi sunt √ÆncƒÉ de actualitate »ôi care a fost sus»õinut de √ÆncƒÉ al»õi patru parlamentari rom√¢ni. Acest Memorandum, primul la nivel mondial, a fost trimis tuturor pƒÉr»õilor implicate, ambasadelor »ôi guvernelor, »õƒÉrilor membre NATO »ôi UE, l-am sus»õinut √Æn Parlament. Prin acest Memorandum nu doar cƒÉ solicitam ca Rom√¢nia sƒÉ nu se implice deloc √Æn conflict, nici direct, nici indirect, a»ôadar sƒÉ nu participe la transferul de arme cƒÉtre Ucraina, ci »ôi sƒÉ ini»õieze la (truncated)

Today, we pay tribute to the heroes of the Yom Kippur War. On this day in 1973, Israel was attacked by a coalition of Arab states on the holiest day of the Jewish calendar. With courage and determination, the soldiers of the IDF defended their homeland, overcoming incredible odds. The spirit of resilience shown by the Israeli people during this trying time is a testament to the nation's unwavering dedication to peace and security. Let us never forget those who made the ultimate sacrifice for Israel‚Äôs future. This video describes the Yom Kippur War when Egypt and Syria attacked Israel simultaneously on 2 fronts. In the face of overwhelming odds Israel‚Äîwith the help of US aid‚Äîmanaged to defeat its enemies but endured an enormous loss of life during the conflict. https://youtu.be/Tdl7MuJZRqs?si=2nFDrBnrNmOdWqjp:=:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tdl7MuJZRqs #YomKippur #yomkippurwar #TodayInHistory

NINE DAYS NOVENA TO THE QUEEN OF THE MOST HOLY ROSARY üïäÔ∏è‚òòÔ∏èüïäÔ∏è‚òòÔ∏èüïäÔ∏è‚òòÔ∏èüåºüïäÔ∏è‚òòÔ∏èüïäÔ∏è‚òòÔ∏èüïäÔ∏è‚òòÔ∏è IN THE NAME OF THE FATHER, AND OF THE SON, AND OF THE HOLY SPIRIT. AMEN DAILY PRAYER OF NOVENA TO THE QUEEN OF THE MOST HOLY ROSARY üåº * 5 OR 20 DECADES OF HOLY ROSARY OF MOTHER MARY* *üïäÔ∏èOUR LADY OF HOLY ROSARY NOVENA PRAYER* (daily) *‚òòÔ∏èNOVENA PRAYER CORRESPONDENCE TO THE DAY* *üåøSTORM PRAYER TO MOTHER MARY MISTRESS OVER ALL DARKNESS* üåº *CLOSING PRAYER* OUR LADY OF THE HOLY ROSARY NOVENA PRAYER (DAILY) *My dearest Mother Mary, behold me, your child, in prayer at your feet. Accept this Holy Rosary, which I offer you in accordance with your requests at Fatima, as a proof of my tender love for you, for the intentions of the Sacred Heart of Jesus, in atonement for the offenses committed against your Immaculate Heart, and for this special favor which I earnestly request in my Rosary Novena: (Mention your request).* *I beg you to present my petition to your Divine Son. If you will pray for me, I cannot be refused. I know, dearest Mother, that you want me to seek Gods holy Will concerning my request. If what I ask for should not be granted, pray that I may receive that which will be of greater benefit to my soul.* *I offer you this spiritual Bouquet of Roses, because I love you. I put all my confidence in you, since your prayers before God are most powerful. For the greater glory of God and for the sake of Jesus, your loving Son, hear and grant my prayer. Sweet Heart of Mary, be my salvation. Amen* NINETH DAY PRAYER Ah, my Queen, continue to guard me from hell; for what will thy mercy and the favours thou hast shown me avail me if I am lost? If I did not always love, now at least-after God-I love thee above all things. Never allow me to turn my back on thee or on God, Who, by thy intercession, has granted me so many graces. Love me, 0 Mary, my hope; save me from hell. But save me first from sin which alone can condemn me to it.Amen* *Queen of the most holy Rosary, in these times of such brazen impiety, manifest thy power with the signs of thine ancient victories, and from thy throne, whence thou dost dispense pardon and graces, mercifully regard the Church of thy Son, His Vicar on earth, and every order of clergy and laity, who are sore oppressed in the mighty conflict. Do thou, who art the powerful vanquisher of all heresies, hasten the hour of mercy, even though the hour of God's justice is every day provoked by the countless sins of men. For me, who am the least of men, kneeling before thee in supplication, do thou obtain the grace I need to live righteously upon earth and to reign among the just in Heaven, meanwhile, in company with all faithful Christians throughout the world, I salute thee and acclaim thee as Queen of the most Holy Rosary: Queen of the most holy Rosary, pray for us.* STORM PRAYER TO MOTHER MARY MISTRESS OVER ALL DARKNESS *O Mary, Heavenly Queen and mistress of all things created, who are invested by God with the fullness of power over all demons and over all and any power of the evil, in great distress I surrender myself completely to you.* *O IMMACULATE CONCEPTION, BREAK IN ME ANY TEMPTATION. O CO- REDEMPTRIX WITH CHRIST, PURIFY ME OF ALL AND ANY TRACES OF SIN. O TERROR OF DEMONS, I IMPLORE YOU TO WIELD YOUR TREMENDOUS POWER OVER ANY FORCE OF EVIL WHICH WOULD DARE THREATEN ME.* *Most powerful mistress, I implore you, do command any demon who is torturing me, discouraging me, troubling my mind, depriving me of all peace of heart, paralyzing me with fear, anguish and all kinds of ill-dispositions, or guiding me towards sin and vice, to prostrate themselves at your feet, in order to be subjected to punishment and humiliation to your satisfaction. I implore you, do command them to praise and to glorify the power you have over them, and prostrate at your feet, to confess that you are their Mistress. In order for me to gain entire freedom, I totally, unconditionally and eternally consecrate my entire being to you, and with all the angels and saints I acknowledge and confess my faith in your unlimited and over whelming power over all demons and over all plan, schemes and works of evil.* O MARY, powerful mistress of all souls, protect me. O Mary, powerful mistress of all souls, deliver me. O Mary, powerful mistress of all souls, rule over me and my life. O Mary, powerful mistress of all souls, rule over all darkness. Amen üåº‚òòÔ∏èüïäÔ∏èüôèüïäÔ∏è CLOSING PRAYER *I greet you, ever blessed Virgin, Mother of God, throne of grace, miracle of almighty power! I greet you, sanctuary of the Most Holy Trinity and Queen of the Universe, Mother of mercy and refuge of sinners!* *Most loving Mother, attracted by your beauty and sweetness, and by your tender compassion, I confidently turn to you, and beg of you obtain for me of your dear Son the favor I request in this novena: (state your specific request or intention here!)* *Obtain for me also, Queen of Heaven, the most lively contrition for (truncated)

In the name of God, the most Gracious, the most merciful, and peace and blessings be upon Muhammad, the Messenger, his family and companions „Ä∞Ô∏è‚ñ™Ô∏è„Ä∞Ô∏è‚ñ™Ô∏è„Ä∞Ô∏è Al-Adl wal-Ihsan (Justice and Spirituality) Movement Guidance Council üìù Communique on Modification of family code The new discussion about amending the Family Code comes in the context of talking here and there about deficiencies in its legal framework without providing any precise and impartial diagnosis, open to the public, that could demonstrate with figures the scope and category of these deficiencies with respect to areas and significance. In contrast to addressing these deficiencies away from the necessary data to build any proposal, the discussion neglects the major deficiencies that hinder the proper implementation of any valid and suitable law. Among these major deficiencies is the absence of a democratic system based on partnership and true consultation (Shura) with various societal forces. A system that binds responsibility to accountability and relies on national competences rather than loyalties ; a system that is immune to corruption, and where a specific group does not monopolize the nation's wealth, while millions of Moroccan families live in deprivation and social fragility, which affects their material and social conditions, as well as their children's education and access to various health and welfare services. Another major deficiency is the reduction of the issue of woman, family, and children to the legal framework of the family code and the disregard of the State‚Äôs responsibility for the major difficulties endured by these groups, leading to complex problems within families. Also, one of the major deficiencies is the absence of an education system that instills in the learners, males and females, the morals and values which would qualify them to build families characterized by compassion, love and cohesion, while rejecting violence, narcissism and discord. Another major deficiency is the unfair implementation of the code articles, either in their current form or any other form. This is due to the major defects in the judiciary, in general. The endeavor to ‚Äúreform‚Äù the family code must not be separated from tackling the above-mentioned deficiencies, among others. Notwithstanding the sanctity of the family, it is just one element in the political, social, economic, educational, and cultural sphere. What makes matters gloomier is that some parties that were tasked to lead the current reform are known for their impartiality and their hostile ideological attitudes, all that at the expense of the righteous and truthful religious scholars ‚ÄòUlama‚Äò who must have the ultimate say on the issue. We are talking about the central role of the scholars as we consider the adherence to Islamic frame reference as the basis that provides us with clear vision and sound judgement. The Islamic teaching is not only a basis for bringing Muslims from closer together and fostering understanding among them but also represents the common denominator, the founding principle, and the recognized authority that we cannot imagine any public discussion about amending the family code outside its scope. Islam is the religion of the Moroccan people, they embraced, imprinted on their souls, interwoven with their history, civilization, and culture. Islam has defined their identity and maintained their unity and has never been a source of conflict or division. The Islamic frame reference is, thus, not limited to the laws, rather it is a project of renaissance and progress, a commitment to human rights, the rights of the people and the Muslim community, for both women and men equally, without discrimination in rights and responsibilities, except for what God has specified for each of them in terms of rulings and matters that correspond to the nature of their obligations and purposes. We, thereby, emphasize the supreme authority of the Islamic frame of reference, and we reject any proposition that contradicts it, while the jurisprudence (Ijtihad) from within Islam provides a platform for addressing any complicated issues, and we will never accept any compromise on clear-cut rulings in the Islamic Shari‚Äôa. We advocate for responsible jurisprudence (ijtihad) because as it is easy to stray from the fundamentals of religion by resorting to exceptional interpretations from any school of thought, ultimately placing oneself outside the framework of any valid jurisprudential ruling. Historically, one of the grave errors committed against this great religion in many cases has been the distortions of religious jurisprudence resulting in rulings that neither fall within the realm of religious law nor provide satisfactory answers to what is required. On this occasion, we address the ‚ÄòUlama to remind them of their great responsibility to speak the truth without fear of blame, especially when it concerns attempts to tamper with what remains sacred of the Sharia of the Seal of (truncated)

Late Governor Carlos M. Padilla Honored By Three Local Councils for Outstanding Public Service The late Governor Carlos M. Padilla, widely known as the ‚ÄúLegend of the North,‚Äù was recently recognized for his exceptional public service by the three local councils of Nueva Vizcaya. The Provincial Peace and Order Council (PPOC), the Provincial Anti-Drug Abuse Council (PADAC), and the Provincial Task Force to End Local Communist Armed Conflict (PTF-ELCAC) passed Resolution No. 1, Series of 2023, in his honor. In the resolution, the councils described Governor Padilla as an exemplar public official and a distinguished veteran in public service. His strategic actions, programs, projects, and activities aimed at promoting, improving, and enhancing peace and order, and public safety in the province were particularly highlighted. Governor Padilla, during his tenure, proposed and supported various programs that led to the declaration of Nueva Vizcaya as a drug-free and insurgency-free province. He also spearheaded initiatives to end local armed conflict, demonstrating his unwavering dedication to public service. The resolution further states, ‚ÄúGovernor Padilla‚Äôs exceptional leadership skills and his enormous contributions to the nation in the maintenance of peace and order, and public safety in the province are a testament to his dedication and commitment. According to Gov. Atty . Jose V. Gambito who succeeded the late governor and now the chair of the three local councils,he is committed to continuing the late Governor‚Äôs initiatives and programs, ensuring that his vision for a peaceful, safe, and progressive Nueva Vizcaya lives on. The PPOC-PADAC-PTF-ELCAC will continue to strive for a drug-free and insurgency-free province, upholding the standards set by Governor Padilla. Governor Gambito additionally remarked , ‚ÄúThe people of Nueva Vizcaya will always remember Governor Padilla as a stalwart of public safety and peace, and his influence will continue to shape the province for years to come. His unwavering dedication to public service, exceptional leadership skills, and enormous contributions to the nation will always be remembered and cherished‚Äù. Governor Padilla sadly passed away due to myocardial infarction on May 5,2023 after dedicating over 30 years of his life to public service as a mayor of Dupax del Norte ,congressman, and governor of Nueva Vizcaya.#RMI

üó£Ô∏è Hey everyone, let‚Äôs talk about why checking in with your partner is so important for building a healthy, long-lasting relationship. It‚Äôs easy to get caught up in our busy lives, but taking the time to check in can make all the difference. Here‚Äôs why it matters...‚úçüèæ ü§ù Open Communication: When we check in with our partner, we create a safe space for open and honest communication. It‚Äôs a chance to share our thoughts, feelings, and any concerns we may have. By actively listening and expressing ourselves, we deepen our understanding of each other and strengthen our bond. ‚ù§Ô∏è Emotional Support: Life can be tough, and checking in allows us to offer much-needed emotional support to our partner. It shows them that we‚Äôre there for them, ready to listen and provide comfort when they need it most. This kind of support nurtures the foundation of our relationship and helps us navigate through life‚Äôs challenges together. üîó Strengthening Bonds: Regular check-ins are an opportunity to nurture the bond we share with our partner. It‚Äôs a chance to appreciate each other, express gratitude, and celebrate the small moments that make our relationship special. By investing time and effort into our connection, we create a strong sense of security, trust, and intimacy. üíî Conflict Resolution: Let‚Äôs face it, conflicts happen in every relationship. Checking in allows us to address issues promptly and constructively. It‚Äôs a chance to talk openly about concerns, find common ground, and work towards resolution with love and respect. By tackling conflicts head-on, we build a stronger and healthier relationship. üå± Growing Together: People change and grow over time, and relationships should too. Regular check-ins provide an opportunity for personal and mutual growth. By sharing our dreams, aspirations, and individual goals, we support each other‚Äôs personal development while strengthening our connection as a couple.

***URGENT APPEAL - ARMENIANS OF NAGORNO-KARABAKH*** ACERO is calling upon all our donors to assist the displaced Christian Armenians of Artsakh. The conflict in Nagorno-Karabakh has seen the mass exodus of ethnic Armenians from the region. It is reported that 100,000 have fled the their homes in the pursuit of finding a safe haven across the border in Armenia. His Holiness Mar Awa III, Catholicos Patriarch, has stressed the importance of emergency assistance to these families who are in dire need of supplies, including clothing and medicine. In a letter to the faithful of the Assyrian Church of the East, His Holiness stated ‚Äòit is incumbent upon us as Christians to act and to help by donating to those that are suffering.‚Äô You can donate at www.theacero.org/donate:=:https://theacero.org/donate/ THANK YOU üôèüèª

text: ü§î The refit Enterprise became one of the first vessels of the new Columbia-class, and her name was changed to SS Enterprise. She was retired in 2161 to make way for new, more advanced starships. By the 23rd century, she had been turned into a museum ship and was housed at the Fleet Museum all throughout the 24th century and was still in her ringed resting place by the time of the Frontier Day massacre (Picard S2-3 "The Bounty", "Vox", and "The Last Generation"). ‚ú® The Enterprise/S.S. Yes, writers are not without challenges. Every stage and journey of a writer to perfection involves challenges and mistakes. Knowing this will help writers stand strong and not quit when faced with challenges. . The Imperfect Path of a Creative Writer signifies the journey and process that creative writers go through in their craft, acknowledging that it's a path marked by imperfections, challenges, and growth. . Know that, writing is an art, a craft, and a journey of self-expression. It's a process where words transform thoughts and emotions into tangible forms, and yet, it's a journey where imperfections and mistakes are not only common but also integral. . Writers are not void of mistakes, but rather, it's through these errors that their craft evolves and their stories become richer. . It's important to recognize that perfection in writing, like in any creative endeavor, is a challenging if not impossible goal to attain. 25 MORE PNP OFFICERS JOIN UNITED NATIONS PEACE-KEEPING MISSION IN SOUTH SUDAN

Philippine National Police Chief, Police General Benjamin C. Acorda Jr., led the send-off ceremony for 25 police officers who are set to be deployed to the United Nations Mission in South Sudan (UNMISS). The event, which took place on October 2, 2023, was attended by dignitaries and officials, including Secretary Antonio Ernesto F. Lagdameo Jr., the Special Assistant to the President.

In his send-off message to the PNP contingent, PGen. Acorda emphasized the significance of the Philippines‚Äô unwavering commitment to international peacekeeping efforts. He stated, ‚ÄúIn line with our noble peacekeeping missions aimed at promoting global peace and security, we gather here today to bid farewell to 25 courageous officers who will be deployed to the United Nations Mission in South Sudan (UNMISS).‚Äù

The Philippines has a long-standing tradition of contributing to UN peacekeeping missions. Over the years, Filipino police officers have consistently served with honor and distinction in various UN operations worldwide, often in challenging conflict zones, where they risk their lives to protect vulnerable communities and uphold the principles of the United Nations.

‚ÄúTo the 25 members of the PNP contingent who are embarking on this mission, you are about to represent the PNP, our nation, and our people on an international stage,‚Äù PGen. Acorda emphasized. ‚ÄúYour journey will be arduous, filled with both triumphs and trials, but I have absolute confidence that you will carry our flag with unwavering pride and unwavering integrity.‚Äù

As these officers prepare to venture forth to South Sudan, the PNP Chief encouraged them to serve with honor, courage, and unwavering dedication. He urged them to return home safely, knowing that their country is immensely proud of their service.

During the ceremony, Secretary Antonio Ernesto F. Lagdameo Jr., the Special Assistant to the President, also addressed the contingent, emphasizing the significance of their mission and the trust that the nation places in their hands. His heartfelt insights and words of encouragement were a profound source of inspiration for the officers as they prepared to face the challenges ahead.

In conclusion, PGen. Acorda extended his heartfelt best wishes to the 25 PNP contingent members, acknowledging the sacrifices they are making by leaving behind the comforts of home, the warmth of their families, and the familiar streets of their nation. He praised their willingness to venture into an environment fraught with uncertainty and danger, commending them for their selflessness and profound sense of duty to uphold the ideals of the United Nations.

‚ÄúMabuhay kayong lahat! May your journey be safe, your mission successful, and your hearts filled with the pride of serving humanity,‚Äù he concluded.

As these dedicated officers embark on their mission in South Sudan, the Philippines stands united in wholeheartedly supporting their noble efforts to promote peace and security on the global stage.

Anderson ‚ÄúDevil Anse‚Äù Hatfield, patriarch of the feuding Hatfields of Logan County, West Virginia, who had long proclaimed a skepticism about religion, was born again and was baptized for the first time at age 73 in the chilly waters of Island Creek. As a Christian, his remaining years were lived in peace. text: If you want a fake relationship, avoid conflict. If you want a real relationship, learn to fight wise. By which I just mean learn how to honor BOTH your own experience AND your partner‚Äôs ... at the same time. Learn to fully feel what you are feeling while simultaneously holding space for your beloved other to fully feel what they are feeling, too. Make space for how they are seeing/describing things even as you continue to hold space for your own ‚Äúversion of truth.‚Äù I know that ain‚Äôt easy ... which is why we run from conflict (even when we stay and fight). We far too often expect to be seen and heard before we are willing to see and hear. Yet we cannot receive a love we are not willing to offer. The partner you‚Äôre looking for is not the one you‚Äôll never fight with. It‚Äôs the one who‚Äôs willing to stay in the fire with you when things suddenly turn shitty, who‚Äôs willing to take radical ownership of their part in starting that shit-fire, and who can (at least before long) say, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry for my part in this. I love you. Killing as a means of surviving, @T&T HARD CORE News More money for Carnival than for the Communities. The reason for murders, is well known and has been well documented over the years. Lack of food, water, shelter, education and even distribution of the country's wealth, will bring out the animalistic instincts in humans to kill to survive. In Trinidad, the killers are still those in survival mode, this can escalate into an enterprise. But we are about to spend 12 million dollars on Carnival in Tobego and more so in Trinidad , as residence are scrambling for food to eat, this tell us a lot about humans. Despite the thin decorative covering of civilization that envelops man, retains deep-seated animalistic instincts that can drive him to kill in order to survive. These primal urges, rooted in our evolutionary history, have been ingrained in our genetic makeup for millions of years and can surface in the most extreme circumstances, revealing the raw, survival-driven nature that lurks beneath the surface of all of us. 1. Fight or Flight Response: The most fundamental of these instincts is the "fight or flight" response. When faced with a life-threatening situation, the body's autonomic nervous system triggers a cascade of physiological changes that prepare us to either confront the threat or flee from it. In situations where escape is not an option, the instinct to fight to the death may take over. 2. Hunting and Gathering Instincts: Throughout human history, our ancestors were hunter-gatherers, relying on their ability to hunt animals and gather edible plants for sustenance. This hunting instinct, deeply ingrained in our DNA, still exists within us, and in dire situations, it can drive individuals to kill other creatures, including other humans, in search of food, money or valuables. 3. Territoriality and Resource Competition: Many animals are territorial and fiercely defend their territory and resources against intruders. In human societies, this instinct has evolved into a drive to protect one's home, family, and possessions. In extreme situations where resources are scarce or in high demand, individuals may resort to violence to secure what they need for themselves and their loved ones. 4. Social Hierarchies and Dominance: Just as in many animal species, humans have hierarchical structures within their societies. The desire for dominance and status can lead to conflicts and aggression. In some cases, individuals may resort to killing rivals or challengers in order to maintain or enhance their position in the social hierarchy. Some believe the poor in society has its place, which is to do the hard and dirty work, cleaning roads and garbage collecting. 5. Group Dynamics and Survival: Humans are inherently social creatures, and our survival instincts extend to the protection of our social groups. In situations of perceived threat or conflict, individuals may feel compelled to eliminate perceived enemies or threats to the group's survival, even if it means taking another person's life. 6. Desperation and Fear: When pushed to the brink of survival, individuals can experience extreme fear and desperation. These emotions can override moral and ethical considerations, leading people to commit acts of violence that they might otherwise find abhorrent. 7. Psychological Factors: In some cases, mental health issues or psychological trauma can amplify these instincts. Individuals suffering from severe psychological distress may be more prone to acts of violence as they grapple with their inner turmoil. It is essential to emphasize that while these instincts are deeply rooted in our biology, human society has developed complex systems of laws, norms, and ethics to temper and control them. Most people live their lives without resorting to violence to survive, relying instead on cooperation, empathy, and the rule of law. However, understanding the existence of these instincts can shed light on the potential for violence in extreme circumstances, and it underscores the importance of nurturing a society that promotes peaceful coexistence and conflict resolution. "But sometimes my child just has to get with the program!" Who's program are we talking about here? Externally imposed structures are usually designed without neurodivergence in mind, and directly conflict with the structures neurodivergent need to regulate themselves. As parents and caregivers, you are in the difficult position of being responsible for putting in structures to help your autistic child thrive. It can be a big change in thinking to realise that the structures, routines and rituals neurodivergent people put in place may actually be serving a helpful purpose. Many people instinctively see these as being bad or symptoms of disorder so then try to train the person out of it or discipline them for doing this. This is quite harmful to neurodivergent people. Instead of imposing rigid rules that take away your child's coping strategies, it is better to work collaboratively to first understand why neurodivergent people are doing what they are doing, and then working with them to develop structures that best support their growth and ability to thrive.

Why is the FEAST of the OUR LADY OF THE ROSARY, on every October 7th? 
..... The story of the  VICTORY OF OUR LADY OF THE ROSARY at the Battle of Lepanto, on OCTOBER  7, 1571.

IN TIMES OF ACUTE DANGER AND HARDSHIP, WE MUST ALWAYS FLY INTO THE ARMS OF THE MOST POWERFUL MOTHER OF GOD AND TURN TO THE RECITATION OF HER HOLY ROSARY. The Battle of Lepanto is a great lesson of confidence for us today. 

When Saint Pius V became Pope, Christendom faced the perils perhaps unequaled in its history of continual conflict with the violent followers of Mohammed. All the information and intelligence that Pope Pius V had been gathering indicated that the Ottoman juggernaut was about to roll across the Mediterranean and adjacent lands, spearheaded by the Turkish fleet, with Italy and Rome as one of its target. (The Ottoman Empire is also historically known in Western Europe as the Turkish Empire)

Only Spain and Venice had the resources to resist, and they hated each other along with deep mistrust. Yet Saint Pius ‚Äî calling down divine grace as only a man of prayer could ‚Äî forged an alliance with them as the core of an organized fleet of over 200 galleys. With his considerable tact and diplomatic skills, he not only kept them unified, but he convinced them to attack the enveloping menace.

The Archbishop of Mexico had an exact copy of the HOLY IMAGE OF THE LADY OF GUADALUPE sent to King Philip II, who in turn gave it to Andrea Doria, one of the three principal admirals of the fleet, who placed it in his cabin. When the Armada went from file to line abreast and attacked on the morning of OCTOBER 7, 1571 the blue standard of OUR LADY OF GUADALUPE was also flying from the masthead of Don Juan‚Äôs flagship. 

Pope Pius V, a Dominican prelate before becoming a Pope, did what Catholics have always done in times of acute danger: FLY INTO THE ARMS OF THE MOST POWERFUL MOTHER OF GOD. As a follower of Saint Dominic, HE KNEW THE MOST EFFECTIVE MEANS OF IMPLORING HER HELP WAS THROUGH THE RECITATION OF THE HOLY ROSARY. He ordered all monasteries and convents in Rome to increase their prayers for the impending battle and organized ROSARY PROCESSIONS in which he, as sick as he was, participated. OUR LADY‚ÄôS PRESENCE THAT DAY WAS MORE ACUTELY FELT THROUGH THE HOLY ROSARY.

As the Christian fleet sailed toward the great clash, MASS WAS CELEBRATED AND THE ROSARY RECITED DAILY ON EACH VESSEL‚Ä¶.. THIS HEARTFELT REQUEST FOR DIVINE ASSISTANCE RESULTED IN A CRUSHING DEFEAT OF THE OTTOMANS AT LEPANTO THAT ENDED THEIR DOMINANCE AND CRUELTY IN THE MEDITERRANEAN. OCTOBER 7, 1571, WAS THE VICTORY OF OUR LADY OF THE MOST HOLY ROSARY, EVEN IF THE CHRISTIAN FLEET WAS GREATLY OUTNUMBERED BY THE OTTOMAN FLEET.

TO CELEBRATE OUR LADY‚ÄôS INTERCESSION AND VICTORY, THE CHURCH HAS DESIGNATED OCTOBER 7 AS THE FEAST OF OUR LADY OF THE MOST HOLY ROSARY. Similar acknowledgement to the Blessed Virgin‚Äôs intercession through the Rosary were made when John Sobieski forced the Turks to lift the Siege of Vienna in 1683 and after the victory of Prince Eugene of Savoy at Temesvar in his successful campaign to remove the Ottomans from Europe in the next century.

text: In 1889, nearly 100,000 coal miners went on strike in Germany to demand higher wages and shorter workdays. These strikes pushed Emperor Wilhelm II to introduce a labor reform program. He called for a conference with other European leaders on how to manage the growing demands of united workers. In 1890, European political elites gathered in Germany to attend this conference on labor standards for coal mining and employment limits for women and children. As the conference began, coal miners in England and Wales launched a wage strike that grew to about 260,000 participants, including women and children. A New York Times article warned of ‚Äúthe possibilities of a gigantic and ruinous labor conflict open[ing] before us‚Äù if coal owners did not accept worker demands. In the 1900s, Western elites would increasingly invest in alternative, oil-based energy systems to avoid the effective strikes and labor power that characterized coal production. For more key events in the history of the climate crisis and related teaching ideas, explore our new timeline at https://www.zinnedproject.org/news/climate-crisis-has-a-history/ #TeachClimateJustice Image: A Welsh coal strike in the 1890s. Source: Office for National Statistics
