The Joint Task Force Commander Col Antwi Awuah Darkwah, on Wednesday 4 October 2023, as part of efforts to bring lasting peace to Bawku and its environs and also promote free movement of goods, personnel and services, led a team to conduct a confirmatory reconnaissance to the new station and other areas to assess the security situation on ground. The Military are putting on measures to ensure the closer of all satellite markets and lorry stations at the outskirts are closed by Monday. Since the beginning of this conflict in 2021, we have always maintained that the satellite markets and lorry stations should be closed down for both Mamprusi, Kusasi and all the other tribes to operate from same market and stations, not because we can't be on our own but for us all to coexist for the conflict to die. We applaud the military for this move and we encourage our friends on the other side to reason positive this time round for peace to return to our beloved Bawku.

The Hidden Struggles of Work Addiction... Often, we're praised for our work addiction, but it can be a destructive force. When professional success comes at the cost of failing relationships and neglecting loved ones, it's not true success. As the go-to person, finding help can seem impossible, but it's necessary. Using work as an escape only makes things worse, exacerbating problems at home. Avoidance of conflict and familial issues can lead to a cycle of self-deception and procrastination, eroding the very life you've built. Many experience the same struggles, trapped in the cycle of denial and evasion. The first step is to reach out, break free from self-deception, and seek support. Don't let work addiction define your life; there's a path to balance and fulfillment. ü§ù #WorkAddiction #SeekHelp #BreakTheCycle

HOW TO PREVENT FINANCES FROM RUINING YOUR RELATIONSHIP/ MARRIAGE: Money: the lack or plenty of it, the use or misuse of it; money can be a source of conflict and strain in a relationship/ marriage. These are some of the ways to ensuring money does not become an impediment to the health of your love; 1. LOVE THE PERSON NOT THEIR MONEY Don't let money be the reason you love a person. For money can come and go, sometimes we make losses at times profit. If your love for someone is based on their wealth or lack of it then it is not love but a commercial opportunity. Don't peg love on money. 2. DISCLOSE YOUR OWN YOUR FINANCIAL TRAIL Tell your partner your financial background, if you have debt, if you were once wealthy then got broke and why, if you have plenty and how you got to be so rich. Your partner needs to know who he/ she is committing to. 3. EARN A LIVING THAT IS FULFILLING Pursue a job or income activity you love. If you hate your work it will affect your peace and joy, you'll be bringing your frustrations home to your partner, ever complaining and bitter why you work so hard in something you hate so that you two can meet needs. When you love your work, you enjoy paying for the daily bread 4. BOTH OF YOU SHOULD CONTRIBUTE Pay bills together, pick bills and items each of you will pay for. She can pay for house needs, he school fees. Both of you should find ways to contribute as this will not make anyone feel overburdened or useless. When someone gives they have more confidence and joy. Even a man who demands to be the sole provider will admire and respect a woman who can earn and handle finances too. 5. BE AWARE OF EACH OTHER'S CAPACITY Even as you both contribute it doesn't necessarily mean you two will be individually on the same financial level. Don't discriminate or look down on each other based on capacity, you are in this together. 6. GROW TOGETHER Whatever little or much you have as individuals or a couple, there is still room for growth. They say no romance without finance but actually love motivates people to grow, when people have a target for their love they become better especially if the person walks with them towards financial growth. 7. BE OPEN AND TRANSPARENT Be financially naked, be an open book. Have a joint bank account if you agree, have access and information. Tell your partner when you're broke or when you get a lucrative deal. You don't really trust your partner if you don't trust him/ her with your finances. 8. HAVE A COMMON FINANCIAL GOAL Analyze the health of your finances together, scout for opportunities, formulate short, mid and long term financial plans, work as a team. Have a common purpose, invest, save together. 9. MAKE FINANCIAL DECISIONS TOGETHER Even if it is money you individually earned, involve your partner when making financial decisions. Involve your partner before making a purchase as this enhances teamwork, joint ownership, and trust. Agree together which car to buy, which house to live in, what to have as priority. 10. LIVE WITHIN YOUR MEANS Don't spend more than you earn. Don't force yourself to live in a class bracket you cannot sustain, instead, work towards getting to that class. Be financial disciplined and plan for what's ahead. 11. ENJOY WEALTH TOGETHER No need to work so hard yet you don't enjoy your wealth. Spoil yourselves, treat yourself with the fruit of your joint labor. You deserve it. 12. REFRAIN FROM USING FINANCES AS A WEAPON Avoid financial abuse especially if you are the one who earns more. Don't revenge or fight your partner with financial sanctions or intimidation when things are not good between you two. Don't go down that love threatening road. 13. AVOID DEBT As much as you can, avoid debt. Even if you will take loans, work on being self sufficient as a couple as soon as possible. Aim for surplus. 14. KEEP OFF COPING OTHER COUPLES AND TRENDS Even if you see other couples spending big, buying fancy cars, mortgaging mansions, living a high life; don't fall into the temptation of copying them. Find your own lifestyle which you can comfortably sustain. Don't let the pressure to fit in or your desire for a glossy public image mislead you to making crippling financial decisions. 15. COMPLIMENT EACH OTHER'S FINANCIAL STRENGTH AND WEAKNESS Some people are brilliant creatives but poor at managing resources, others are spendthrifts, others are good at managing but not good at earning money, others have alot of money but others have ideas that need financing. Find out each other's strengths and weaknesses and work as a team in forming a powerful financial force. 16. REMEMBER WEALTH IS NOT A TICKET TO HAVING AFFAIRS Even when you get abundance of wealth, remain faithful. Don't use your wealth to get pleasure on the side, use your wealth to love your partner even more.

A great reminder that if you're in Washington, you're in bear country! Thanks WSDOT for the great photos from around the state (and of course, the lovely drawing). Katmai's Fat Bears aren't the only ones currently bulking up. This is a crucial time of year for bears to put on as much weight as possible heading into winter, and they're looking for calories anywhere they can get it. This month in 1944, Big Mamie BB-59 departed the Marshall Islands on 6 October, sailing to support the landings in Leyte Gulf. In an effort to block Japanese air attacks in the Leyte conflict, she participated in a fleet strike against Okinawa on 10 October. Between 12 and 14 October, she protected forces hitting Formosa. While part of TG 38.3 she took part In the famous Battle for Leyte Gulf between 22 to 27 October, during which planes from her group sank four Japanese carriers during the Battle of Cape Engano. While on station on October 25, 1944, during the Battle of the Leyte Gulf, the Japanese deploy kamikaze (‚Äúdivine wind‚Äù) suicide bombers against American warships for the first time. Your battleship was there.... (Photo is of BIG MAMIE evading aircraft in April 1945 and used for reference only)

A Case of Religious Fear Mongering, or Celestial Battle? The account itself was first recorded by a publicist named Hanns Glaser. He was mostly known for being caught stealing woodcuts from other competitors to sell them as his own. He was also known for sharing highly inflated versions of seemingly normal events. Hanns would later find himself in a situation that would ultimately end his career as a publicist, which was more copyright infringement. Regardless of his moral character, he always did his best to captivate his audience, even if it meant stealing someone else's work or fabricating events to make his own work more interesting. One example of this was recorded in a depiction of the Aurora Borealis. Instead of waves of color in the sky, he illustrated them as flames shooting towards the ground, and described it with obvious religious undertones. This religious-mania fear mongering is apparent in the text below, first recorded in 1561, the famous account of Nuremberg's battle in the sky. Also, quoted below the account recorded by Glaser is a similar account from a Swedish newspaper. The written account itself shares the same type of religious undertones, however this account is accompanied by numerous images provided by other eye witnesses. These images offer a more logical understanding of what they were viewing. It is in fact nothing more than an early documented record of sundogs. By Hanns Glaser, letter-painter of Nuremberg "In the morning of April 14, 1561, at daybreak, between 4 and 5 a.m., a dreadful apparition occurred on the sun, and then this was seen in Nuremberg in the city, before the gates and in the country ‚Äì by many men and women. At first there appeared in the middle of the sun two blood-red semi-circular arcs, just like the moon in its last quarter. And in the sun, above and below and on both sides, the color was blood, there stood a round ball of partly dull, partly black ferrous color. Likewise there stood on both sides and as a torus about the sun such blood-red ones and other balls in large number, about three in a line and four in a square, also some alone. In between these globes there were visible a few blood-red crosses, between which there were blood-red strips, becoming thicker to the rear and in the front malleable like the rods of reed-grass, which were intermingled, among them two big rods, one on the right, the other to the left, and within the small and big rods there were three, also four and more globes. These all started to fight among themselves, so that the globes, which were first in the sun, flew out to the ones standing on both sides, thereafter, the globes standing outside the sun, in the small and large rods, flew into the sun. Besides the globes flew back and forth among themselves and fought vehemently with each other for over an hour. And when the conflict in and again out of the sun was most intense, they became fatigued to such an extent that they all, as said above, fell from the sun down upon the earth ‚Äòas if they all burned‚Äô and they then wasted away on the earth with immense smoke. After all this there was something like a black spear, very long and thick, sighted; the shaft pointed to the east, the point pointed west. Whatever such signs mean, God alone knows. Although we have seen, shortly one after another, many kinds of signs on the heaven, which are sent to us by the almighty God, to bring us to repentance, we still are, unfortunately, so ungrateful that we despise such high signs and miracles of God. Or we speak of them with ridicule and discard them to the wind, in order that God may send us a frightening punishment on account of our ungratefulness. After all, the God-fearing will by no means discard these signs, but will take it to heart as a warning of their merciful Father in heaven, will mend their lives and faithfully beg God, that He may avert His wrath, including the well-deserved punishment, on us, so that we may temporarily here and perpetually there, live as his children. For it, may God grant us his help, Amen." ================ Article in a Swedish Newspaper "It happened in 1566 three times, on 27 and 28 of July, and on August 7, against the sunrise and sunset; we saw strange shapes in the sky above Basel. During the year 1566, on the 27th of July, after the sun had shone warm on the clear, bright skies, and then around 9 pm, it suddenly took a different shape and color. First, the sun lost all its radiance and luster, and it was no bigger than the full moon, and finally it seemed to weep tears of blood and the air behind him went dark. And he was seen by all the people of the city and countryside. In much the same way also the moon, which has already been almost full and has shone through the night, assuming an almost blood-red color in the sky. The next day, Sunday, the sun rose at about six o'clock and slept with the same appearance it had when it was lying before. He lit the houses, streets and around as if (truncated)

Pictured: A Memory of Light by Robert Jordan and Brandon Sanderson Spoilers! I think this one is the best book in the series. I enjoyed the action, the pace, and the humour. I don't care that it was all just about the last battle; I enjoyed the detail and all of the moving parts. But I really think that another book could have been written to wrap things up properly. There are so many loose ends because as soon as the last battle was done, that was the end of the book lol. The Aiel and Tinkers never got to sing with the Ogier and Rand, which I was hoping was going to be a big event. Mat even heard the song before. The Black Tower was hardly a big part of the story. I would have liked to see what became of everyone after the last battle as well. I think that the Perrin/Slayer conflict was drawn out too much. Androl and Talmanes both turned out to be favourite characters lol. What was your favourite part of the book? What didn't you like? Are there any mentions of this series being continued in the future?

Nations Trust WNPS Monthly Lecture WILDLIFE AND WILDERNESS IN THE NORTH Largely ignored but of vital value By Dr S Wijeyamohan 6 pm, 19th October 2023, Jasmine Hall, BMICH On the ending of the war in 2009, immediate visitors to the North and the East were astonished at the sight of pristine forests, unlike many left in the remainder of the country, intact and preserved and beautiful, vast tracts of forest and large numbers of wildlife endured. That was 14 years ago, and the narration has changed since. Today, there are reports of rampant deforestation and the killing of wildlife taking place here. Human-elephant Conflict has reached levels never seen before. Yet, just as during the War, information on this barely trickles through to the general public and they remain blissfully unaware that the Nation‚Äôs Natural Wealth is being ravaged here, as it is in much of the rest of the island, at a rate never seen before. Are these areas, freed with considerable human and financial cost, all to be destroyed in a couple of decades? What of the revenue these wonderful places and creatures could bring to the country, and the local communities, if they are protected and shown off to the World? Are we to sacrifice the future on the altar of greed?, Dr. S. Wijeyamohan is well known in conservation circles as someone who has long championed the cause of conservation in the North and the East. Specializing in Wildlife Ecology, Conservation and Management, he is a Senior Lecturer in the Department of Bio-science of the University of Vavuniya. There can be none better than Dr. Wijeyamohan to help us understand the reality, and lift the fog of ignorance of these vastly biodiverse, and increasingly threatened, vitally precious areas of this Nation. The monthly lecture of the WNPS is supported by the Nations Trust Bank. It is open to both members and non-members, ENTRANCE FREE. Image Credit PDev Mukund

October 06, 2023 DEEP PEACE IN PEACE PROFOUND, AS OUR SOUL‚ÄôS HERITAGE AND BIRTHRIGHT ÔÇß Deep Peace, known to Rosicrucians as Peace Profound, comes from within, and in wisdom of the soul. We gain access to this wisdom and its peace by facing and surmounting challenges as necessary catalyst for growth and evolution in life, without which, life becomes stale and stagnant. We meet challenges, stress and conflict, first, in intellect and emotions, and later, we deal with those same issues externally. We find inner peace of the soul by facing the storm and turmoil of the Unknown internally first as we learn to bravely face the ‚ÄòTerror of the Threshold.‚Äô Metaphorically speaking, inspiration from our soul creates veritable inner battleground; wounds are struck by love and compassion; shattered bones are brought about by strong desire on the Path to unite with God of our Understanding and Greatest Yearning. Attunement with the soul becomes reality, when we understand, fight, struggle and give our best for the soul. It cannot be sought casually in times of extreme distress, or just by going to temple in belief that this is enough to unite with our soul. Our attunement must be constant guiding light as soul merges with our outer daily living in volition and control. With good level of attunement, energy flows through us at all times. Benefits of Attunement ÔÇß With inspiration from our soul, definite challenges manifest within ourselves on how to conduct our outer lives with energy, dynamism and potential to accomplish in life what helps us to forward on inner plane of awareness. This ‚Äòinner motion‚Äô translates to outer motion to improve our lives. Through attunement, we receive wisdom, inspiration and energy necessary to succeed in our work, achieve harmony in personal relationships, and find inner peace. We receive guideline on ‚Äúour most important aim in life‚Äù, by listening to our Inner Voice of the soul as Guiding Light of life. This is key to achieving oneness and attunement as part of our lives. Attunement together with its attendant knowledge and inspiration, brings right implementation in spirit and intention. Promptings of our soul are always good for us and those nearest and dearest to us, as our soul ceaselessly places us in situations where we face our various un-compensated-for elements in people, animals and scenarios within our ‚Äòkarmic proximity‚Äô. We assist this process to the letter of the law by observing the manifested results. With confidence in received advice and guidance from ‚ÄòStill Small Voice Within‚Äô, as our ‚ÄòInner Master‚Äô for necessary implementation, we stop further analysis of received impression, through accurate guidance of our capable Master-Guide in The Unlimited Potential Of our Soul. As long as our connection remains, and we heed the voice of our Inner Master, we have periods of intense happiness, great tranquility and Peace Profound, under the most trying outer conditions. The Eternal Quest ÔÇß Mystics are veritable knights in shining armor, fighting inner battles in cause of good where the knight knows the safety of the soul and experiences dangers of straying away from it. As ardent seekers of our deeper spiritual insight, we explore with great care and tenderness the great wisdom of the soul with sublime serenity in presence of the Infinite and the Eternal as we integrate with our soul, amidst periods of great fear and loneliness when we temporarily stray away from its Presence to forget its profound wisdom. The depths of the soul are discovered through the intensity of our desire, and we receive in accordance with universal law and willingness to give first, and patiently wait for just and right rewards, even if those rewards take more than single lifetime to come to fruition. When our consciousness extends to all nature, we are one with the Infinite and Eternal in what Rosicrucians refer to as the ‚ÄòGod of our Heart.‚Äô At this point on the Path, we reach new, higher realization of ourselves. We are one with nature, harmony, peace and strength, and we remain there as long as we retain open channel of communication with our soul. The challenge brought tension and inner turmoil in its wake, but we overcome them and with total, deep Peace in Peace Profound, harmony and profound understanding as nature of our soul, heritage and birthright. Reference - Peace Profound - The Challenge of Finding your Soul - by Amelia 46The Rosicrucian Beacon -- December 2022, pages 46- ¬© Supreme Grand Lodge of AMORC, 46 ORDO ROSAE CRUCIS ¬Æ Prepared and Published by Ezeudembah AS, FRC

The "Dead Parrot Sketch", alternatively and originally known as the "Pet Shop Sketch" or "Parrot Sketch", is a sketch from Monty Python's Flying Circus about a non-existent species of parrot, called a "Norwegian Blue". A satire on poor customer service, it was written by John Cleese and Graham Chapman and initially performed in the show's first series, in the eighth episode ("Full Frontal Nudity", which first aired 7 December 1969). The sketch portrays a conflict between disgruntled customer Mr Praline (played by Cleese) and a shopkeeper (Michael Palin), who argue whether or not a recently purchased parrot is dead.

Something that's definitely worth thinking about: if our children learn harsh, reactive, loud, unkind behaviors from us as parents, and we focus on disciplining them, but not ourselves, we're being hypocritical. And they know it. Improved emotional regulation, conflict resolution, patience, kindness, respect, honor, and responsibility in our children has to start with the parents, caregivers, and teachers who influence the child. And no, changed behavior in adults doesn't equal immediately changed behavior in children. A child's brain takes 2.5 decades to develop, and even longer for neurodiverse children! But ultimately, what we expect from our children must be modeled for them by us.

OUR DAILY MANNA 07 October 2023 THOUGHTS ON TODAY‚ÄôS VERSE... Peace is more than the mercurial, vaporous, whimsical wish of folks who want everyone to get along and things to be calm. The peace the apostle Paul describes is true peace with God. This peace goes much deeper than simply our desire for calmness and a lack of conflict. Jesus, through his sacrificial obedience to God, has made peace with God real for us. Yes, God provided it by grace. Yes, God is the one who ensures it because of that grace. But, because this peace is tied to him and his character, we can rejoice and anticipate being caught up in the glory of our majestic and holy God in whom we have eternal peace. MY PRAYER... O majestic and holy God on high, I praise you for the gift of your grace in Jesus. Please give me confidence and trust to stand in your grace and be emboldened to live for you with a life full of holiness, anticipation, and joy. In Jesus' name, I pray. Amen.

Hard work pays off! We're excited to share the two most recent Maine Game Warden promotions: Please join us in Congratulating Lieutenant Michael Joy and Corporal Cody Lounder!

Sergeant Mike Joy has been selected as the new Lieutenant for the northern Maine division based out of Ashland. He has dedicated the last 30 years of his career to the Maine Warden Service, has been assigned to districts in each division of the state throughout his tenure, and was promoted to Sergeant in 2018. Sergeant Joy spent more than 23 years on the dive team, serving nine of those years as team leader and Corporal. Sergeant Joy also developed our airboat training program and is a member of the Critical Incident Stress Management Team. He is sure to hit the ground running in his new role during the busy fall season.

Warden Cody Lounder has been selected as the Special Projects Corporal assigned to the Augusta Headquarters, and will be assisting with, among other assignments, oversight of the Wildlife Conflict Agent program, the bureau‚Äôs training program, the guide examination process, legislative process as well as the bureau‚Äôs accreditation process. He has been with the Maine Warden Service for more than nine years and is a member of the Honor Guard. He has been a Warden Training Officer for more than three years, is an Emergency Vehicle Operation Course instructor, is a breath testing device instructor, and spends the spring and early summer training southern Maine boating deputies. Warden Lounder is also a certified Crime Scene Investigator and has been a member of the Evidence Response Team for over seven years. 

Congratulations Lieutenant Joy and Corporal Lounder! The Maine Warden Service is extremely lucky and very proud to have you on our team. 

#GameWarden #AllInForTheMaineOutdoors #WardenService #Promotion

Why is the FEAST of The OUR LADY OF THE ROSARY, on every October 7th? The Feast Day of Our Lady of the Holy Rosary we celebrate on Oct. 7 originated from the victory of Lepanto (1571) attributed to the maternal intercession of Our Lady. It was instituted by Saint Pius V to commemorate and thank the Virgin for her help in the victory over the Turks at Lepanto on October 7, 1571. Saint Pius V established this feast in 1573. Clement XI extended the feast to the universal Church in 1716. IN TIMES OF ACUTE DANGER AND HARDSHIP, WE MUST ALWAYS FLY INTO THE ARMS OF THE MOST POWERFUL MOTHER OF GOD AND TURN TO THE RECITATION OF HER HOLY ROSARY. The Battle of Lepanto is a great lesson of confidence for us today. When Saint Pius V became Pope, Christendom faced the perils perhaps unequaled in its history of continual conflict with the violent followers of Mohammed. All the information and intelligence that Pope Pius V had been gathering indicated that the Ottoman juggernaut was about to roll across the Mediterranean and adjacent lands, spearheaded by the Turkish fleet, with Italy and Rome as one of its target. (The Ottoman Empire is also historically known in Western Europe as the Turkish Empire) Only Spain and Venice had the resources to resist, and they hated each other along with deep mistrust. Yet Saint Pius ‚Äî calling down divine grace as only a man of prayer could ‚Äî forged an alliance with them as the core of an organized fleet of over 200 galleys. With his considerable tact and diplomatic skills, he not only kept them unified, but he convinced them to attack the enveloping menace. The Archbishop of Mexico had an exact copy of the HOLY IMAGE OF THE LADY OF GUADALUPE sent to King Philip II, who in turn gave it to Andrea Doria, one of the three principal admirals of the fleet, who placed it in his cabin. When the Armada went from file to line abreast and attacked on the morning of OCTOBER 7, 1571 the blue standard of OUR LADY OF GUADALUPE was also flying from the masthead of Don Juan‚Äôs flagship. Pope Pius V, a Dominican prelate before becoming a Pope, did what Catholics have always done in times of acute danger: FLY INTO THE ARMS OF THE MOST POWERFUL MOTHER OF GOD. As a follower of Saint Dominic, HE KNEW THE MOST EFFECTIVE MEANS OF IMPLORING HER HELP WAS THROUGH THE RECITATION OF THE HOLY ROSARY. He ordered all monasteries and convents in Rome to increase their prayers for the impending battle and organized ROSARY PROCESSIONS in which he, as sick as he was, participated. OUR LADY‚ÄôS PRESENCE THAT DAY WAS MORE ACUTELY FELT THROUGH THE HOLY ROSARY. On the eve of battle, the men of THE HOLY LEAGUE PREPARED THEIR SOULS BY FALLING TO THEIR KNEES ON THE DECKS OF THEIR GALLEYS AND PRAYING THE ROSARY. At dawn on October 7, 1571, the Holy League rowed down the west coast of Greece and turned east into the Gulf of Patras. When the morning mist cleared, the Christians, rowing directly against the wind, saw the squadrons of the larger Ottoman fleet arrayed like a crescent from shore to shore, bearing down on them under full sail. As the fleets grew closer, the Christians could hear the gongs and cymbals, drums and cries of the Turks. The men of the Holy League quietly pulled at their oars, the soldiers stood on the decks in silent prayer. PRIESTS HOLDING LARGE CRUCIFIXES MARCHED UP AND DOWN THE DECKS EXHORTING THE MEN TO BE BRAVE AND HEARING FINAL CONFESSIONS. .......THEN THE BLESSED VIRGIN INTERVENED! ....... The wind shifted 180 degrees. The sails of the Holy League were filled with the Divine breath, driving them into battle. As the Christian fleet sailed toward the great clash, MASS WAS CELEBRATED AND THE ROSARY RECITED DAILY ON EACH VESSEL‚Ä¶.. THIS HEARTFELT REQUEST FOR DIVINE ASSISTANCE RESULTED IN A CRUSHING DEFEAT OF THE OTTOMANS AT LEPANTO THAT ENDED THEIR DOMINANCE AND CRUELTY IN THE MEDITERRANEAN. OCTOBER 7, 1571, WAS THE VICTORY OF OUR LADY OF THE MOST HOLY ROSARY, EVEN IF THE CHRISTIAN FLEET WAS GREATLY OUTNUMBERED BY THE OTTOMAN FLEET. TO CELEBRATE OUR LADY‚ÄôS INTERCESSION AND VICTORY, THE CHURCH HAS DESIGNATED OCTOBER 7 AS THE FEAST OF OUR LADY OF VICTORIES AND LATER ON TO OUR LADY OF THE HOLY ROSARY. By popular acclamation, the advocation ‚ÄúHelp of Christians‚Äù was added to the Litany of Loreto. Chapels with the invocation of Our Lady of Victories begin to emerge in Spain and Italy. At the Venetian Senate hangs a painting of the battle which the following inscription below it: "Non virtus, non arma, non duces, sed Maria Rosarii victores nos fecit (Neither the troops nor weapons, nor the commanders, but Mary of the Rosary who made us the victorious)." Similar acknowledgement to the Blessed Virgin‚Äôs intercession through the Rosary were made when John Sobieski forced the Turks to lift the Siege of Vienna in 1683 and after the victory of Prince Eugene of Savoy at Temesvar in his successful campaign to remove the Ottomans from Europe in the next century. True Victory comes from God through the intercession of (truncated)

Mizoram CM Zoramthanga unveiled "AMBUSH : Awar story" a period film set in the 1960s of the Mizo Uprising at MZU Auditorium. Produced by Leitlang Pictures & Directed by Mapuia Chawngthu, this movie takes you on a historical journey through the MNF's 'Operation Jerico,'in the 60s. offering a unique perspective on its title deeply rooted in his personal experience. The Chief Minister shared a somber reflection on the name "Ambush," drawing from his own attempts to bring the Mizo uprising to the silver screen. Despite the formidable challenges in the world of filmmaking, he commended the burgeoning Mizo Film Industry and encouraged filmmakers to aspire to new heights. Mapuia Chongthu, the Director behind "Ambush: A War Story," revealed a decade-long desire to bring this project to life, which had been constrained by budget limitations until recently. By collaborating with Dr. Zarzosanga, an authority in Mizo Uprising History, Chongthu expressed his gratitude for the meticulously crafted script that propelled the project forward. The Director emphasized the unwavering dedication of the cast, emphasizing that their commitment was instrumental in making the film a reality. More than just a source of entertainment, "Ambush" serves as an essential educational film, chronicling the historical Mizo conflict. Chongthu expressed his elation at the official launch of the project by Chief Minister Zoramthanga. This latest Mizo flick features a cast of 70 actors and boasts the distinction of being the highest-budget production ever undertaken in Mizoram. With a runtime of two hours and fifty minutes, "Ambush: A War Story" promises to be a landmark cinematic portrayal of the historical Mizo Uprising. Renewed interesting Mizoram about the Mizo Uprising and the Rambuai literature helps and shows the growing importance of Mizo cinema in preserving and reclaiming the region's rich historical narratives. #Mizoram #MizoUprising #Indiragandhi #Mizorambombing #northeastindia #zoramthanga #themizos

text: TO THE EGYPTIAN PEOPLE! We, the MNLF and the Bangsamoro people, join our Egyptian brothers and sisters in commemorating the bravery of your soldiers who fought valiantly during the 1973 October War. 6th of October serves as a reminder of the sacrifices made by the Egyptian people and the unity they demonstrated in defense of their nation. We honor the memory of your fallen heroes who sacrificed their lives to defend your country and maintain its freedom and sovereignty. We are also delighted to see you celebrate the day when your Armed Forces launched a surprise attack on Israeli forces in the 1973 October War. That offensive proved Egypt's military capabilities that led to a change in the dynamics of the ongoing Israeli-Palestinian conflict. That monumental event solidified Egypt's position as a regional power and highlighted its determination to achieve peace and security in the Middle East. Ustadz Abdulkarim Tan Misuari Deputy Speaker of BTA-Parliament BARMM Vice-Chairman, MNLF Central Committee

TINGNAN: KAPAMILYA NG DALAWANG REBELDENG NASAWI SA ENGKWENTRO DUMULOG SA HIMPILAN NG PULIS DARAGA Malugod na pagtanggap ang ipinadama ng kapulisan ng Daraga MPS sa kapamilya ng mga rebeldeng nasawi sa madugong ingkwentro na naganap sa Brgy. Bascaran, Daraga, Albay tatlong araw ang nakalipas. Nitong Huwebes, Oktubre 5, 2023, naglakas loob na kumatok sa tanggapan ni PLTCOL EDMUNDO A CERILLO JR., Hepe ng Daraga MPS ang naiwang kapamilya ng mga nasawing rebelde upang humingi ng tulong asistensya na mabigyan ang mga ito ng maayos na libing. Bakas sa kanilang mga mukha ang labis na pagdadalamhati at pangungulila. Sa kabila ng sagupaang naganap sa pagitan ng nasabing rebeldeng grupo at mga alagad ng batas, mas nanaig pa rin ang kabutihang loob ng ating kapulisan. Hindi nagdalawang isip si PLTCOL CERILLO JR na paunlakan ang kanilang pakiusap. Bukod dito, hinandogan din sila ni PLTCOL CERILLO JR. ng tulong pinansyal at muling nagpaabot ng pakikiramay. Dahil sa tulong na handog ng Pulis Daraga, labis-labis ang kanilang pasasalamat. Humingi rin sila ng paumanhin sa mga nagawang paglabag sa batas ng rebeldeng grupong kinabibilangan ng mga nasawi, partikular ang tangkang pamamaslang sa apat na kapulisan ng Daraga MPS BPAC. Anila, wala man lang silang natanggap na anumang tulong mula sa mga kasamahan ng kanilang mga kaanak na nasawi na labis na ikinasasama ng kanilang kalooban. Ang pagtanggap na ito sa kapamilya ng mga nasawing rebelde ay patunay lamang na ‚ÄúANG PULIS DARAGA AY HINDI KAAWAY AT HANGAD NAMIN ANG KAPAYAPAAN AT LIGTAS NA BAYAN‚Äù. Muli kaming nanawagan sa ating mga kapatid na nabubulag sa maling ideolohiya at mapanlinlang na doktrina ng teroristang grupo. Walang mabuting dulot ang paggamit ng armas at pagpapalaganap ng karahasan. Maraming buhay na ang nasayang, maraming pamilya na ang nawalan ng mahal sa buhay. Huwag ninyong ipagkait sa inyong mga anak, asawa, magulang at kapamilya ang pagkakaroon ng masaya, malaya at tahimik na buhay. Magbalik-loob na sa pamahalaan upang mabigyan ng pagkakataong makapag-bagong buhay kasama ang pamilya sa tulong ng Enhanced Comprehensive Local Integration program (E-CLIP) at ng iba pang programa sa ilalim ng National Task Force to End Local Communist Armed Conflict (NTf-ELCAC). #SerbisyongNagkakaisa #WeServeAndProtect #PNPGoodDeeds Daraga Public Information Office PNP Kasurog Bicol PCADG Bicol Region Albay Police Provincial Office Ed Cerillo Jr.

OUR LADY OF THE HOLY ROSARY 
     NOVENA PRAYER (DAILY) 

*My dearest Mother Mary, behold me, your child, in prayer at your feet. Accept this Holy Rosary, which I offer you in accordance with your requests at Fatima, as a proof of my tender love for you, for the intentions of the Sacred Heart of Jesus, in atonement for the offenses committed against your Immaculate Heart, and for this special favor which I earnestly request in my Rosary Novena: (Mention your request).*

*I beg you to present my petition to your Divine Son. If you will pray for me, I cannot be refused. I know, dearest Mother, that you want me to seek Gods holy Will concerning my request. If what I ask for should not be granted, pray that I may receive that which will be of greater benefit to my soul.*

*I offer you this spiritual  Bouquet of Roses,  because I love you. I put all my confidence in you, since your prayers before God are most powerful. For the greater glory of God and for the sake of Jesus, your loving Son, hear and grant my prayer. Sweet Heart of Mary, be my salvation. Amen*

NINETH DAY PRAYER

Ah, my Queen, continue to guard me from hell; for what will thy mercy and the favours thou hast shown me avail me if I am lost? If I did not always love, now at least-after God-I love thee above all things. Never allow me to turn my back on thee or on God, Who, by thy intercession, has granted me so many graces. Love me, 0 Mary, my hope; save me from hell. But save me first from sin which alone can condemn me to it.Amen*

   *Queen of the most holy Rosary, in these times of such brazen impiety, manifest thy power with the signs of thine ancient victories, and from thy throne, whence thou dost dispense pardon and graces, mercifully regard the Church of thy Son, His Vicar on earth, and every order of clergy and laity, who are sore oppressed in the mighty conflict. Do thou, who art the powerful vanquisher of all heresies, hasten the hour of mercy, even though the hour of God's justice is every day provoked by the countless sins of men. For me, who am the least of men, kneeling before thee in supplication, do thou obtain the grace I need to live righteously upon earth and to reign among the just in Heaven, meanwhile, in company with all faithful Christians throughout the world, I salute thee and acclaim thee as Queen of the most Holy Rosary: Queen of the most holy Rosary, pray for us.*

STORM PRAYER TO MOTHER MARY
  MISTRESS OVER ALL DARKNESS

*O Mary, Heavenly Queen and mistress of all things created, who are invested by God with the fullness of power over all demons and over all and any power of the evil, in great distress I surrender myself completely to you.*

*O IMMACULATE CONCEPTION, BREAK IN ME ANY TEMPTATION. O CO- REDEMPTRIX WITH CHRIST, PURIFY ME OF ALL AND ANY TRACES OF SIN. O TERROR OF DEMONS, I IMPLORE YOU TO WIELD YOUR TREMENDOUS POWER OVER ANY FORCE OF EVIL WHICH WOULD DARE THREATEN ME.*

*Most powerful mistress, I implore you, do command any demon who is torturing me, discouraging me, troubling my mind, depriving me of all peace of heart, paralyzing me with fear, anguish and all kinds of ill-dispositions, or guiding me towards sin and vice, to prostrate themselves at your feet, in order to be subjected to punishment and humiliation to your satisfaction. I implore you, do command them to praise and to glorify the power you have over them, and prostrate at your feet, to confess that you are their Mistress. In order for me to gain entire freedom,  I totally, unconditionally and eternally consecrate my entire being to you, and with all the angels and saints I acknowledge and confess my faith in your unlimited and over whelming power over all demons and over all plan, schemes and works of evil.*

O MARY, powerful mistress of all souls, protect me.
O Mary, powerful mistress of all souls, deliver me.
O Mary, powerful mistress of all souls, rule over me and my life. 
O Mary, powerful mistress of all souls, rule over all darkness. Amen

Hoe ziek en hypocriet zowel de NAVO als EU zijn, zie je ook in hoe ze zelfs hun eigen regels aan hun armyboots lappen: een land in conflict zou niet kunnen toetreden tot deze organisaties. EU politiek was altijd: geen wapens naar conflictgebieden en ban clustermunitie. En nu leveren ze miljarden aan wapens en zelfs verboden munitie, en het gebruik van uraniummunitie is plots helemaal niet meer schadelijk. Straks zijn we waarschijnlijk ook de enigen die het met uraniumstof vergiftigde graan nog importeren uit Oekra√Øne of wat daar nog van over is. Geen probleem toch, die uraniummunitie, kijk maar naar Novi Sad en Fallujah. Maar ja, beide organisaties zetten alles op alles om te voorkomen dat Rusland dit conflict dadelijk be√´indigd op haar voorwaarden, daar ze weten dat dat ook tot het uiteenvallen √©n marginalisatie van hun clubje zal leiden. Dus Rusland, het land met de meeste atoomkoppen en snelste raketten om die af te leveren moet verliezen, terwijl iedereen op zijn klompen aanvoelt dat Rusland niet zal verliezen, en zou het verliezen, dat het dan de hele wereld zou meeslepen in de nucleaire afgrond. Maar toch moeten de Westerse Elites blijven escaleren, willen ze overleven.... En raken we dus ondertussen door ons Oekra√Ønse kannonenvoer heen... de bodem is te zien, net als de oorlogsmoeheid, de verslagenheid en de wanhoop bij de Oekra√Øense soldaten, die als ze zich proberen over te geven, vaak door hun AZOV broeders en ander Nazigebroed in de rug worden geschoten. Het Russisch leger vecht ondertussen niet met spades, heeft geen electronica nodig uit wasmachines e.d. om hun raketten te laten vliegen, het is geen ongeregeld zooitje, zoals Westerse propaganda ons wilde doen geloven. Nee, het is inmiddels een professionele vechtmachine die haar gelijke niet kent, die al voor zo'n 100miljard(!) aan (groot deel Westerse superieure) wapens heeft vernietigd, en langzaam staat er een enorm leger klaar waarvan nog niet de helft is ingezet. Ook de Russische wapenindustrie produceert op zowat elk vlak een veelvoud aan spul vergeleken met het Westen. Voor elke Rus die sneuvelt, sneuvelen er 6 tot 10 Oekra√Øners(en buitenlandse huurlingen/contractors) De arme klootzakken die we voor ons karretje hebben gespannen sterven dus als vliegen, een onzinnige dood in een onzinnig gevecht in een strijd die al gestreden is: het moment van de start van de Russische operatie eind februari 2022, was het moment dat Westerse dominantie werd gebroken. Maar nu hoop ik maar dat we hier in het Westen onze elites/neocons op tijd stoppen voor het te laat is: een wereld zonder Rusland, gaat slechts een nucleaire winter tegenmoet!

Listen up, party people! I've got news for you: Reading is the MOST fun you can have with your clothes on. No, seriously, I've done the research. üìà Forget skydiving. Adios, fancy dinner parties. Sayonara, roller coasters. When you've got a killer plot twist, unforgettable characters, and dialogue that sizzles, who needs adrenaline? Well, unless it's from turning the pages too fast. üöÄ Let's face it, books are like nightclubs for your imagination. They've got VIP sections (the best chapters), bouncers (dramatic conflict), and if the book's good enough, you'll leave at 2 AM wondering what just happened to your life. üï∫üíÉ So, let's spill the tea, bibliophiles. What's the most exhilarating read you've had recently? The one that had you glued to the page like you were on some kind of literary roller coaster? Share below and let's make this the Book Club Meeting of the Century! ü§îüëá

üö®üö®üö®üö®üö®üö®üö®üö®üö®üö®üö®üö® VERY IMPORTANT CASE LAW FOR CANADIANS: Wow guys, this is amazing! A new case law regarding the Bill of Rights has surfaced and includes the following in it's ruling: 1. overturned law and states that if a statute is in conflict with the Bill then the Bill wins 2. the right to fair hearing as per 2 (e) of the Bill! THIS CASE LAW IS POST CHARTER: Have a read through the highlights below and please share! MacBain v. Canadian Human Rights Commission et al., (1985) 62 N.R. 117 (FCA) **Civil Rights - Topic 8081** Canadian Bill of Rights - Powers of courts where statute conflicts with Canadian Bill of Rights - The Canadian Human Rights Commission found that a complaint was substantiated and under s. 39(1)(5) of the Canadian Human Rights Act appointed a Tribunal to inquire into the complaint and acted as prosecutor of the complaint before the Tribunal - The Federal Court of Appeal held that there was a reasonable apprehension of bias in violation of s. 2(e) of the Canadian Bill of Rights and declared s. 39(1)(5) of the Canadian Human Rights Act inoperative in the situation - See paragraphs 36 to 39. **Civil Rights - Topic 8081** Canadian Bill of Rights - Powers of courts where statute conflicts with Canadian Bill of Rights - The Federal Court of Appeal held that a statute which offends the Canadian Bill of Rights should be declared inoperative in the situation, which restricts the inoperative effect to the facts and is not as drastic as declaring the statute void or invalid - See paragraphs 31 to 35. **Civil Rights - Topic 8303** Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms - Effect of - On Canadian Bill of Rights - The Federal Court of Appeal held that the Canadian Bill of Rights continues in full force with the advent of the Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms - See paragraphs 24 to 29. **Civil Rights - Topic 8348** Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms - Application - Exceptions - Reasonable limits prescribed by law - The Federal Court of Appeal rejected a utilitarian approach to determining reasonable limits to Charter rights - See paragraph 22. This is not a magic bullet by any means, however, this is the BEST single piece of case law that the Bill is still operable, that 2(e) was upheld and that the Bill overturned law! This is the BEST single piece of case law that states the Bill is still operable, that a right to a fair trial under 2(e) of the Bill was upheld and that the Bill overturned law!

ARTIKEL PILIHAN: MALAYSIAN POLICEMAN GOES ON A UN PEACEKEEPING MISSION IN SOUTH SUDAN UN peacekeepers play a critical role in fulfilling the UN peace operations to maintain international peace and security. Peacekeepers‚Äô tasks vary according to mandates from the UN Security Council. Each mandate is different according to the nature of conflicts and threats to peace. Some of the common responsibilities involve preventing outbreaks of conflict, stabilising conflict situations, assisting with the implementation of peace agreements, and assisting states to transition to stable governments through democratic principles. Most missions are in countries facing hardship where there are significant security risks and where there is likely to be a long road of recovery in rebuilding what had been lost due to conflict and displacement of people. There are currently 12 active peacekeeping operations across Africa, Asia, the Middle East, and Europe. During my 19 years of service with the Royal Malaysia Police, I was fortunate to be entrusted with responsibilities ranging from intelligence to crime prevention and management. However, when the department advertised for expressions of interest for a peacekeeping tour of duty with United Nations Police (UNPOL), I thought it would be an opportunity to seek a fresh professional and international challenge. Follow the full story of the Contingent Commander (CC) of the Malaysian UNPOL, Superintendant Dr. Sivabalan Suppiah who recounted his experience who had the opportunity to serve as an UNPOL police officer in southern Sudan for a year in the following link, https://www.thestar.com.my/lifestyle/people/2023/10/06/malaysian-policeman-goes-on-a-un-peacekeeping-mission-in-south-sudan.

HOLY AND DIVINE LOVE MESSAGES FROM THE PAST (for us to reflect on today - October 6, 2023) April 19, 2009 Heaven Speaks to the Heart of the World (specifically - the path the world is taking) Midnight Service at the United Hearts Field - Feast of Divine Mercy (This message was given in multiple parts over several days.) Jesus is here as He is in the Divine Mercy Image; there is a huge Flame behind Him. He says: "I am your Jesus, born Incarnate. I come to you tonight from the Will of the Eternal Father Whose Flame of Love you see behind Me." "My brothers and sisters, I come to you as your Merciful Jesus. Those who love Me understand My Mercy and My Love, which are one. These are the ones that allow My Mercy and My Love to shine through them into the world. These are the ones who understand the call of My Heart to repentance of each soul. I will refuse no one who turns to Me with a repentant heart." "Today the foundation of a one-world government has been laid through the global economic collapse which Satan has orchestrated. As this unfolds, remember that your free will remains intact. No one can dictate the affections of your heart. Live always in Holy Love. Remain calm; be at peace. If your heart is steeped in love of God and love of neighbor, you are safe, for I am with you." "Hope, indeed, springs eternal for those who place their trust in Me. See in all world events the coming of the Kingdom of the Divine Will of My Father. Believe in this Kingdom - the New Jerusalem - which is alive in hearts living in Holy Love." "Those who have made hatred into a 'religion' will destroy themselves. They cannot succeed, for Truth will be victorious. Holy Love is the Heart of Truth. In truth I tell you, it is now the hour of decision. Take up the weapons of prayer and sacrifice as I call together My army ** against evil. My victims of love are the officers in this spiritual army. I tell you, the battle against evil must be won in hearts before it is won in the world." "During these decisive and difficult times, it is important to realize that conflict and wars arise in hearts because of conflict with the Commandments of Love. God desires all of creation to be in harmony with His Divine Will. This is why He has created this apparition site and this Mission. The more that people accept and surrender to Holy Love, * the greater the graces poured out here. Therefore, with hearts that emulate Divine Mercy and Divine Love, make the Messages known." "My Mercy will never be depleted, but the dawn of My Divine Justice is at hand. Satan seeks to destroy all that is good and loving, using people and nature to accomplish his goals. Depend on Divine Mercy and Divine Love to see you through the worst of times. From My Love and My Mercy flows My Provision." "I invite you to realize that when the Holy Love in your heart is compromised, every virtue begins to erode. It is as if the roots of a great tree were Holy Love. The trunk would be humility; the blossoms on this great tree are the different virtues. The roots and the trunk (love and humility) must remain healthy for the whole tree to be healthy. In the spiritual life, Holy Love and Holy Humility feed and support all the other virtues. Therefore, if Holy Love erodes, faith and hope are weakened. If humility is compromised, the rest of the tree of virtues begins to wither." "Within each soul is this mystical tree of virtue; it gives life or else it withers and dies. In society this tree of virtue is necessary towards world peace. If it is ignored and not watered with Holy Trust, the world around the tree suffers. This is what leads to lack of peace in hearts." "You may wonder at My depiction of personal holiness as this tree of virtue. But I invite you to see that each soul's journey or growth in holiness affects the heart of the world, for the heart of the world is a composite of the hearts of all its citizenry. The tree of virtue in the heart of the world is drying up from lack of care. In its place is the tree of antipathy towards God and His Commandments. The roots of this tree are hatred; the trunk is arrogant pride; the blossoms are not blooms but rather spoiled fruit - each one opposing virtue. This tree is beginning to thrive, nourished by man's over-indulgent trust in himself - through self-love." "With a compassionate heart for the spiritual crisis in the heart of the world, realize that the tree of virtue stretches heavenward towards perfection in God's Will. On the other hand, the tree of antipathy towards God suffers from neglect and lack of care and takes on a countenance of death. Unless the gardener notices this poor tree, it will face a grim future." "This is why I have come here - to draw attention to the state of the heart of the world. My plea is urgent. Nourish your hearts with the food of virtue. Do not be motivated by self-love, but by love of God and neighbor. This is what will redirect the future of the world. Otherwise, all that is good in the (truncated)

We are thrilled to announce that today, a select group of students and staff from Glide School District are setting out on an exceptional educational journey to Atlanta, Georgia. They have been granted the unique privilege of attending the Ron Clark Academy‚Äôs inaugural House System Leadership Academy. Renowned for its groundbreaking educational approaches and unwavering commitment to student leadership, the Ron Clark Academy serves as a beacon of innovation in the educational landscape. During their visit, our students and staff will not only witness firsthand the academy's effective teaching methods but will also engage in enriching workshops and activities. These will cover a broad range of topics, including leadership theory, best practices, conflict resolution, and experiential learning through leadership simulations. This transformative experience aims to equip our group with invaluable insights and tools for effectively leading within a House System environment. It promises to be an immersive learning adventure, and we are eager to see the wealth of knowledge and skills they will bring back to benefit our entire district. As they embark on this extraordinary endeavor, we extend our heartfelt wishes for a safe and enriching trip.

Photo: A Los Angeles City Council committee voted unanimously to impose ‚Äúa moratorium on the issuing of breeding licenses.‚Äù Los Angeles Animal Services (LAAS) ‚Äúissued more than 1,100 breeding permits for this calendar year.‚Äù The proposed moratorium ‚Äúnow heads to the full City Council for consideration.‚Äù Once again, while this is welcome, the City Council must also tackle dysfunction at LAAS. Dogs spend weeks or months inside their kennels without a walk. As a result, they experience increased stress, giving LAAS an excuse to kill the dogs as ‚Äúunadoptable‚Äù even though they are healthy and of good temperament outside their kennels. A Los Angeles Times investigation also uncovered rabbits with gouged eyes, guinea pigs without food, and hamsters in urine and feces-soaked cages. And when an employee admitted to striking dogs, the volunteer who exposed him was punished, not the abuser. In other news: - The shelter in Beaumont, TX, illegally fired a volunteer after she expressed concerns about killing dogs on Facebook, despite 21 empty cages. - The Fall 2023 issue of No Kill Sheltering is available for members of The No Kill Advocacy Center. - The last remaining municipal pit bull ban in Colorado has fallen. - A group of bipartisan Michigan lawmakers introduced legislation forbidding any Michigan city from singling out dogs for discriminatory legislation. - In response to what the company calls ‚Äúsurging demand for plant-based cuisine,‚Äù Princess Cruises is rolling out vegan menus on all its ships. - A new Connecticut law prohibits convicted animal abusers from ‚Äúowning, adopting, living with, or working with any animals for a period of five years.‚Äù - Spokane County Regional Animal Protection Service (SCRAPS) killed a cat within hours of his being found, even as Duey‚Äôs person was on her way to pick him up. - The director and another senior manager of the Humane Society of Southern Arizona (HSSA) were suspended pending an investigation by the Board of Directors after transferring over 250 small animals to a company that sells ‚Äúboth live and frozen animals for snake feed.‚Äù - A new study ‚Äúsuggests same-sex sexual behavior among mammals ‚Äî especially primates ‚Äî is not only common and adaptive but supports social relationships and reduces conflict.‚Äù - A new literature review looked at nearly 90 peer-reviewed studies to determine whether ‚Äúdomesticated animals [are] dumber than their wild relatives‚Äù as is commonly believed. And more. This Week in Animal Protection, my weekly column, is here: https://bit.ly/3Q97mSk.:=:https://news.nathanwinograd.org/p/this-week-in-animal-protection-382

James Cleverly says Falklands are British as Argentina ends deal üá¨üáßüá¨üáßüá¨üáß The UK has insisted the Falkland Islands are British after Argentina broke a co-operation deal and pushed for talks on the islands' sovereignty. In 2016, both sides agreed to disagree on the sovereignty of the Falklands in favour of improved relations. Argentina pulled out of the pact this week and informed UK Foreign Secretary James Cleverly. The Falkland Islands were subject to a bloody war in 1982 when Argentina tried to stake a territorial claim. Veterans' Falklands trip marks 40 years since war In response, Mr Cleverly tweeted: "The Falkland Islands are British. "Islanders have the right to decide their own future - they have chosen to remain a self-governing UK Overseas Territory." The 2016 agreement between Argentina and the UK pledged to "improve co-operation on South Atlantic issues of mutual interests". Mr Cleverly was informed about the decision by his Argentinean counterpart Santiago Cafiero when the pair met at the G20 summit in India earlier this week. Mr Cafier called for talks on the sovereignty of the Falkland Islands, known in Argentina as the Malvinas. The UK's minister for the Americas, David Rutley, said it was a "disappointing decision" after he had had a "constructive visit" to Buenos Aires. "Argentina has chosen to step away from an agreement that has brought comfort to the families of those who died in the 1982 conflict," he said. The Falkland Islands are a British overseas territory in the south-west Atlantic Ocean. Argentina has long claimed sovereignty over the islands. Argentina invaded in 1982 in a bid to reclaim sovereignty and said it had inherited the Falkland Islands from Spain in the 1800s. A brief but bitter war lasting 74 days followed - with 655 Argentinian, 255 British and three Falkland deaths - before British forces regained control on 14 June 1982.

James Jabbar Williams, Jr., 18, of Saint Helena Island, SC is in custody and charged with attempted murder and possession of a weapon during the commission of a violent crime. Williams‚Äô charges stem from a shooting at Tiger Express, 375 Sea Island Parkway, Lady‚Äôs Island, SC that left a 50-year-old man suffering from a non-life-threatening gunshot wound. On October 5, 2023, at approximately 4:15 p.m., Sheriff‚Äôs deputies were dispatched to the Tiger Express for a gunshot victim. When they arrived, they found the man suffering from a gunshot wound to his thigh. Deputies learned that a conflict between the victim and Williams began while both were driving on Sea Island Parkway and one cut the other off in traffic. Both vehicles pulled into the Tiger Express gas station where a verbal argument ensued. The argument then escalated to Williams shooting the victim. Deputies quickly identified Williams as the person responsible for the shooting. He was located on Dulamo Road on Saint Helena Island shortly after 5:00 p.m. where he was detained. As the investigation progressed, Williams was arrested and charged. Williams is incarcerated at the Beaufort County Detention Center.

From Passive to Assertive: Empowering Autistic Women Many autistic individuals often find themselves facing unique challenges in their interpersonal relationships. This can lead to feelings of victimisation and, in some cases, even exploitation. In a recent study by Sarah Bargiela and colleagues (2016), participants shared their experiences, shedding light on the journey from passivity to assertiveness and the obstacles they encountered along the way. ** Please note that this post includes references to sexual abuse, which may be distressing to some readers; if you find such content distressing, please consider refraining from reading further. ** Passivity and Its Consequences" Participants frequently linked their perceived passivity to their autism, highlighting how it had led to unhealthy relationships and high-risk situations. One participant expressed the pressure she felt to conform, stating, "I almost feel pressured by society to do it because you get told this is what is expected of you to make you be a good girlfriend, and you think, if I don't do it, then I am not fulfilling my duties." This struggle to please and appease others often left them feeling trapped. Avoiding conflict was another common theme among participants. For many, any form of verbal disagreement was seen as 'having a fight.' This avoidance sometimes resulted in over-assertiveness, leading to damage in their friendships. As one participant put it, "When it finally comes out, I can be a bit too blunt." However, there were exceptions, with some women refusing to appease when they knew something was wrong. A Shocking Incidence of Sexual Abuse" Disturbingly, nine out of fourteen participants reported instances of sexual abuse. Half of these accounts occurred within relationships, where young women felt obliged or "gradually being pestered" into sexual activities. Arguments often escalated into sexual encounters, even when they didn't want to engage. Three young women reported being raped by individuals they didn't know, with one particularly distressing case involving grooming by a peer on behalf of three older men. Several factors contributed to these situations, including social mimicry, difficulty in reading others' intentions, social isolation during adolescence, and a desperate desire for acceptance. Their difficulties in reading people's intentions and understanding social rules left them vulnerable to exploitation and abuse. - "I kept trying to break up with him, and whenever I did, he would say I didn‚Äôt know my own feelings...I felt so trapped." The women spoke of feeling obligated or gradually coerced into sexual activity, often due to societal expectations placed upon them. As one participant commented, ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs potential for you copying a guy‚Äôs flirtatious behaviour without realising that‚Äôs what you‚Äôre doing.‚Äù Learning to be Assertive: Despite narratives of passivity and accounts of abuse, many women also shared stories of personal growth and an increase in their ability to be assertive. They learned to read others' intentions better, which empowered them to leave uncomfortable situations. Some had received guidance, such as "a guide to being assertive" from a counsellor or skills acquired through their jobs. Four women discussed how their diagnosis of autism had become a tool for confidence in asserting their opinions. They no longer felt obligated to provide explanations, and simply saying 'no' became an option. This newfound assertiveness was a testament to their resilience and self-advocacy. Raising Awareness: Protecting Vulnerable Autistic Women: The stories shared by these young women highlight a critical issue that practitioners and society as a whole must address: the high vulnerability and shockingly high rates of sexual abuse among autistic women. It is imperative that professionals in the fields of healthcare, psychology, education, and social work, as well as law enforcement agencies, recognise and respond to the unique challenges faced by autistic women. 1. Education and Training: Practitioners need to undergo specialised training to understand the intricacies of autism, particularly in the context of gender-specific challenges. This includes recognising the signs of abuse and understanding how the characteristics of autism may contribute to a higher risk of victimisation. 2. Trauma-Informed Care: Practitioners should adopt trauma-informed care approaches when working with autistic women who have experienced sexual abuse. Understanding the potential trauma and its effects on mental health is crucial for providing effective support and therapy. 3. Preventative Education: Schools and educational institutions should incorporate comprehensive sex education programs that are adapted to the needs of autistic students. These programs should focus not only on biological aspects but also on relationship dynamics, boundaries, and consent. 4. Early Intervention: Identifying vulnerability factors early on is (truncated)

The world is desperately short on teachers, with 44 million more teachers needed to cover every child by 2030, says a new UNESCO report. Parts of Africa account for one-third of the shortfall. Teachers are leaving the profession twice as often as they were in 2015. ‚Å£ ‚Å£ Across parts of Africa, over 13,000 schools closed over the last four years because of conflict and insecurity, say NGOs ‚Äì including countries like Burkina Faso, the Democratic Republic of Congo and Niger ‚Äì affecting over 2.5 million children. ‚Å£ ‚Å£ One in five children in southern, western and eastern Africa are not in school. The countries with the highest rates of uneducated children also tend to have the highest levels of poverty. ‚Å£ ‚Å£ Worldwide, COVID has also intensified gendered violence and economic disparities between men and women. ‚Å£ ‚Å£ Lack of school access was a problem before the pandemic, with up to 60 million children out of school. Barriers to education, including pandemic closures, unaffordability and gender discrimination, were linked to higher risk of child labor and child marriage. ‚Å£ ‚Å£ Over half of girls who dropped out of school during the pandemic in Kenya, Rwanda, Uganda and Tanzania reported pregnancies, according to UN Women. ‚Å£ ‚Å£ In Africa, most teaching vacancies are for entirely new positions, says UNESCO. But as demand for schooling grows, the availability of places to receive training as a teacher hasn‚Äôt, making positions hard to fill. And once on the job, teaching resources ‚Äî like textbooks, curricula reform and poor equipment ‚Äî also play a large factor in retention. ‚Å£ ‚Å£ Women are much more likely to stay in the field, as jobs with higher pay and social mobility are more available to men. ‚Å£

Despite our ignorance about what is really going on during a conflict situation between two people or groups of people, we only draw to us what is necessary and needed in order to complete our journey back home, or, to say it better, to create a new world that is free of the binding influence of duality. To be able to enter the world of unconditional love, freedom, and non-judgment (the kingdom of heaven) we first needed to go through everything that could feel fearful and restrictive. We all needed to judge others so that we would know how it feels to be judged in turn, according to the laws of karma. Not liking someone is painful to our heart and a restriction to the oneness that we are. Our Higher Self has no such notions of dislike or separation; it naturally feels one with the person with which our ego has difficulties. Through karma, we are attached to one another, positively ‚Äòstuck‚Äô with this person until our human resistance melts down and disappears. Karma‚Äôs only role is to bring back to us the awareness of oneness. (This is a selection from the book LIFTING THE VEIL OF DUALITY by Andreas Moritz) http://www.ener-chi.com/books/lifting-the-veil-of-duality/:=:https://www.ener-chi.com/books/lifting-the-veil-of-duality/

I'm going to see Heather Cox Richardson on her book tour tomorrow! Tell me I'm not alone - when you expect to be in the proximity of someone you admire/respect/fangirl over/whatever, you think about what you would say to them if you had the opportunity to interact. What would you say if you had 10 seconds to tell someone important about something that is important to you? Well this project is a direct result of being told over and over again in her politics chats the best thing we can do to change things is to speak and take up oxygen. When I finally got motivated to do that, I had to really evaluate what my barriers were to doing it and what I could do to get beyond them. Barriers included: Fear of conflict Introvert - I don't talk to people much The lack of time, energy, money, physical ability Feeling like what I say will never be heard, so why bother If those were my barriers, I assumed they were barriers for others as well. So I tried to come up with a way of communicating that got around all those barriers that I could provide for me and people like me. That's what I would say I guess. How would you describe this project? Are there any barriers that hold you back that I might be able to help with?

#ALPHAS_OBSESSION CHAPTER 210 False claims √ó√ó√ó√ó√ó√ó√ó√ó√ó√ó√ó√ó Inside the Skendore estate,where one would expect a bastion of tranquility and orderliness, the gamma and beta were in tumoil,grappled with the challenge of reducing the situation brewing just outside the gates of the estate where reporters and news crews waited,their congregate presence locking down any movement in or out of the estate. "The press situation is spiraling out of control. Despite the gates being locked,they're showing no signs to relent" Felix urgently reported to Azrael, whose normally composed face was now etched with concern. " We need to find a way to shoo them away without adding fuel to the rampant speculations going around. We can't let them dig any deeper" Azrael replied. Their core identities was something they had to protect from the knowledge of humans as getting it exposed would mean unnecessary chaos for both sides of humanity. Human were always poky and nosey with things they didn't know about,they carried insatiable curiosity for the unknown, often reacting with either unwarranted fear or an intrusive desire for elimination. If their true selves were revealed it would undoubtedly lead to relentless probing by scientists and the perilous prospect of human-hybrid conflict and even though they could easily win a waged war between them and humans,it was better to avoid the situation all together. " What if we stage a harmless but distracting event? Something that will pique their interest and make them want to leave the estate,at least for now" Felix suggested, "We could...." "Open the gates and let them in" The sudden presence of someone else inside the large parlour drew both men's attention to the man they hadn't expected to see out of that room any time soon,caught off guard,they watched as he made his way down from the stairs. Dressed in a crisp and professional work attire, with his hair neatly combed, although still bearing a hint of ruffled charm, he exuded the quintessential appearance of a seasoned businessman, meticulously put together from head to toe. The click of his fine leather shoes echoed against the marble flooring as he approached both beta and gamma, giving out his instructions. However, his words caused them to frown and they both stared at the man like he was crazy or had suddenly lost his mind " Alpha, with all due respect,..." Azrael began " we've been trying to keep them out for safety causes, Bringing them in now would be...rather not a wise choice." "I said open-the-gates,and-let-them-in" His voice was deep and commanding,brooking no further argument. Both gamma and beta exchanged incredulous glances,yet,given no choice,they could only comply. . . √ó√ó√ó Amid the grandeur of his lavish mansion, Dorian extended a gracious welcome to the press, ensuring each journalist and reporter was meticulously accommodated with precise. He took his seat on a lone couch, one leg gracefully crossed over the other, his Italian leather shoes gleaming beneath the ambient chandeliers which hung high by the ceiling. His hands,adorned with a diamond watch that exuded of luxury, rested serenely against the arm rest. The cameras and phones set up,were focused and intent on capturing every movement made from him. As he began to speak, his voice resonated with an air of authority, and his poised demeanor demanded the rapt attention of all present, leaving an indelible impression of elegance and power. " Good afternoon, ladies and gentlemen. I appreciate your presence here today. I would like to address the recent news that has been circulating about me being a supernatural being,and I hope to assure you all,that these claims are entirely false" "Mr Skendore,it has been observed you've been notably silent since the news surfaced. Can you explain your reasons for not addressing this issue sooner?" A female reporter questioned,her note pad tightly in her grip as she anticipated a response from the man " Thank you for your question.." Dorian began with a warm smile "I would like to to clarify that my initial silence was not intended to perpetuate any mystery or misinformation. Rather, it was a response to the shock and confusion caused by these unfounded and sudden claims." "But Mr Skendore, some have criticized your lack of response as an act of avoidance. How do you respond to those who feel you should have spoken out or rejected the claims earlier?" Another reporter,inquired,and calmly,Dorian began " I understand those concerns,..My decision to remain silent was based on advice from my legal team and PR advisors. We wanted to ensure that our responses were well-informed and comprehensive, as addressing such sensitive allegations requires careful consideration." " Can you tell us what prompted you to finally break your silence today Mr Skendore" An older reporter asked " Of course.." The man passed a harmless smile,one that hid anything going on in his head,he replied " It became evident that the longer I remained (truncated)

Meet Mark! ‚ù§Ô∏è This handsome beef cake currently weighs in at 60 pounds, and is 4 years old. Mark originally came to us in the fall of 2021 after he was saved from euthanasia at an overcrowded Texas shelter. Mark doesn‚Äôt let his unfortunate upbringing keep him down. He is full of personality and always up for a good time! We thought Mark found his forever home, but unfortunately due to some conflict between Mark and the other dog in the home, it was decided for everyone‚Äôs safety that Mark find a new place to call home. Because of this, we feel Mark would do best in a home as an only pet. He hasn‚Äôt been exposed to any feline friends, but because of his high prey drive to small critters, he would not be a good candidate for a family with cats. Mark is fully potty trained and does well in his crate. He has some FOMO when his four legged friends would leave for a walk and would vocalize his annoyance. Otherwise, Mark is known to seek his crate out anytime he wants to take a nap, and does great while his family is at work. Mark appreciates a good fetch session, and would thrive with someone who can fulfill him both physically and mentally. He is good blend of energy and chill. When Mark has gotten his energy out, he is always down for a cuddle session. Mark is looking for a foster/adopter who can provide him with the structure and consistency he needs to be the best boy possible. He is working on his leash manners and not being so excited when meeting her people. Because of his jumping we think a home with older children or none at all would be best for him. Currently he knows his name, sit and kennel up. He is a smart guy, and is ready to learn! There is so much to love about Mark, and he would be grateful to find someone who is willing to open their heart and home to him. Mark is available for foster or adoption! http://misfitmuttsdogrescue.com/adoption/ http://misfitmuttsdogrescue.com/foster/ E-mail us at misfitmuttsdogrescue@gmail.com with any questions!

An update on our supporters' impact in Batang Toru ü¶ßüåø The Human-Orangutan Conflict Response Unit (HOCRU) initiative was born out of the urgent need to address rising human-orangutan conflicts in North Sumatra and Aceh. MRS-1 (Military Rail Switcher-1) Foreign Service Number: 1811 This was one of thirteen locomotives built by the General Motors Company for the U.S. Army in 1952-53, before the contract was taken over by the American Locomotive Company (ALCo)-General Electric, which produced a further eighty-three. It has six coupled driving wheels, with no leading or trailing wheels, thus referred to as a 0-6-6-0. The diesel-electric locomotive proved to be more efficient than the steam locomotive, in that it was able to convert fuel into energy more efficiently and the need to make frequent stops to refuel was virtually eliminated. Previous experience with operating locomotives in different counties proved to be a challenge for the Army, which took that into account when designing this model. Differing track gauges, couplings, braking systems and truck designs created obstacles when operating American locomotives overseas. The design process behind the MRS-1 was to build a locomotive that could operate on any particular country‚Äôs rail network and be able to use that country‚Äôs own rolling stock. Locomotive #1811 was used in Korea from 1952-54 during the latter part of the Korean Conflict. After the cease fire, it and most of the other locomotives were kept as strategic reserve until the 1970s when they began to be sold or sent to military bases for local use. Locomotive #1811 was last used in at Sunny Point, NC, in 1991 during Operation Desert Shield/Desert Storm.

Elder's Meditation of the Day - Oct 6 "Lots of people hardly ever feel real soil under their feet, see plants grow except in flower pots, or get far enough beyond the street light to catch the enchantment of a night sky studded with stars. When people live far from scenes of the Great Spirit's making, it's easy for them to forget His laws." --Tatanga Mani (Walking Buffalo), STONEY Nature is life's greatest teacher. The natural laws are hidden in nature. Hidden are solutions to everyday problems such as; conflict resolution, how to forgive, lessons about differences, how to manage organizations, how to think. Hidden are feelings. You can look at something and you will feel it. At night, have you ever looked at the sky when there are no clouds? As you look at all the stars, your heart will become very joyful. You will walk away feeling joyful and peaceful. We need to visit nature so we can see and feel these things. My Creator, let me learn nature's lessons. >:< >:< >:< üåø >:< >:< >:< Copied with the permission of Don L.
